1b1(mdo sde): / rgya gar skad du.Ar+ya ku sha la mu la saM pa ri
1b2(mdo sde): gra ha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bo den// skad du/ 'phags pa dge ba'i
1b3(mdo sde): rtsa ba yongs su 'dzin pa zhes byab theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/
2a1(mdo sde): / // sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams
2a2(mdo sde): cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das
2a3(mdo sde): rgyal po'i khab na/ 'od ma'i tshal bya ka la na ta ka gnas pa na/ 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan
2a4(mdo sde): pa rnams kyi gnas/ gnas med pa rnams kyi gnas/ stong pa nyid la gnas pa rnams kyi
2b1(mdo sde): gnas/ mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa dang / smon pa med pa la gnas pa rnams kyi gnas na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong 'bum
2b2(mdo sde): gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang sgra bsnyungs pa/ dben pa la gnas pa/ nang du yang
2b3(mdo sde): dag 'jog la mngon par brtson pa sha stag go/ / de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu nang du ying dag 'jog las langs nas/ bcom ldan
2b4(mdo sde): 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ tshe dang ldan
2b5(mdo sde): pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka pi na dang / tshe dang
3a1(mdo sde): ldan pa skul byed chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa don yod rgyal po dang / tshe dang ldan pa rlangs
3a2(mdo sde): pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed dang / tshe dang ldan pa ci 'jigs dang / tshe
3a3(mdo sde): dang ldan pa nye sbas dang / tshe dang ldan pa mis byin gyi bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa thang la gnas dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo ki la dang / tshe dang ldan pa nye bar
3a4(mdo sde): 'khor dang / de dag dang / gzhan yang dbang dang ldan par gyur pa lnga brgya tham pa phyi 'phred kyi dus kyi tshe/ nang du yang dag 'jog las langs nas
3a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// yang de'i
3a6(mdo sde): tshe tshe dang ldan pa grags sbyin dang / tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong dang / tshe dang ldan pa lhas mchod dang / tshe dang ldan pa grags 'dod dang / tshe dang
3b1(mdo sde): ldan pa dga' sde dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' 'dod dang / de dag dang / gzhan yang dge slong lnga brgya tham pa lam du zhugs pa las/ dbyar mnyan yod na gnas nas/ rgyal po'i khab
3b2(mdo sde): 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod de//
3b3(mdo sde): yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pa de dang 'dra ba'i byang chub sems dpa' stong dang lhan cig tu yul tsam par dbyar gnas nas lam du zhugs te/ rgyal po'i khab
3b4(mdo sde): 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//
3b5(mdo sde): yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong dang / dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang / ded dpon bzang po dang / phug sbas dang / mis byin dang / dbang pos byin
3b6(mdo sde): dang / chu lha dang / tshangs lha dang / stobs bzang dang / bla ma'i blo gros dang / khyad par blo gros dang / 'phel ba'i blo gros dang / mthong ba don yod dang / legs par yang
3b7(mdo sde): ngag zhugs dang / rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon dang / rtag tu brtson dang / brtson pa mi gtong dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / 'gro ba 'dzin dang / sa 'dzin dang / bdud rtsi
4a1(mdo sde): 'dzin dang / blo gros rab gnas dang / blo gros mtha' yas dang / brtan pa'i blo gros dang / 'jig rten gsum rnam par gnon dang / mtha' yas rnam par
4a2(mdo sde): gnon dang / dpag med rnam par gnon dang / rdo rje'i gom pas rnam par gnon dang / don yod pa'i gom pas rnam par gnon dang / mi g.yo ba'i gom pas rnam par gnon dang
4a3(mdo sde): spobs pa chen po dang / spobs pa rnon po dang / spobs pa zab pa dang / spobs pa mtha' yas dang / spobs pa dpag med dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang
4a4(mdo sde): pad+ma dpal gyi snying po dang / chos 'phags dang / lag na rin chen dang / rin chen 'dzin dang / bskal pa 'gyur ba mtha' yas par go cha bgos pa dang / bud med
4a5(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i go cha bgos pa dang / skyes pa 'gyur ba'i go cha bgos pa dang / sems can 'gyur ba'i go cha bgos pa dang / mtha' yas khyu mchog dang / dpag med khyu mchog
4a6(mdo sde): dang / dmigs pa thams cad rnam par 'jigs pa'i khyu mchog dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyang tha mi dad par spyod pa'i go cha bgos pa
4a7(mdo sde): stag ste/ yul tha dad pa rnams su dbyar gnas par gnas nas/ yul rgyu zhing gcig tu 'dus te/ rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa ga la ba dang / bcom
4b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub
4b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag 'dus par thugs su chud nas/ rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad pas/ rgyal po'i khab grong khyer chen po 'od ma'i
4b3(mdo sde): tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa na/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma ji snyed gnas pa de dag thams cad/ bcom ldan 'das la lta ba dang
4b4(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir/ 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
4b5(mdo sde): zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad do// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po lus
4b6(mdo sde): 'phags ri la dbang po'i brag phug na dge slong lnga brgya tham pa thams cad kyang dgon pa pa/ bsod snyoms pa/ phyag dar khrod pa/ chos gos gsum pa/ cog pu pa/ rtswa'i
4b7(mdo sde): gding ba pa/ shing drung pa/ 'dod pa chung ba/ chog shes pa/ rab tu dben pa pa/ chos gos ngan pa 'chang ba sha stag dang thabs gcig tu 'dug go
5a1(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad pas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po dge slong lnga brgya tham pa de dag dang
5a2(mdo sde): lhan cig tu lus 'phags ri'i dbang po'i brag phug nas mi snang bar gyur te/ rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa na 'dug pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par
5a3(mdo sde): 'du mdzad de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po rgyang ring po nyid nas 'ong ba gzigs te/ gzigs nas kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la
5a4(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gnas brtan 'od srungs chen po 'ong ba 'di ni dgon pa pa/ bsod snyoms pa/ phyag dar khrod pa/ chos gos gsum pa/ chos gos ngan pa 'chang ba
5a5(mdo sde): bas mtha'i gnas mal la gnas pa/ 'dod pa chung ba/ chog shes pa/ rab tu dben par gnas pa/ ma 'dres pa/ chos thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa ste/ dge
5a6(mdo sde): slong dag nga'i nyan thos ji snyed pa ni/ dge slong dag da ltar dge slong 'od srungs chen po'i sbyangs pa'i yon tan dag dang mtshungs pa 'dra ba ni/ ngas yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
5a7(mdo sde): dge slong dag dge slong 'od srungs chos gos gsum pa ni/ lha rnams dang yang smra ba dang kun tu smra bar mi 'dod na/ mi rnams dang lta smos kyang mi dgos/ de nas bcom
5b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po rgyang ring po nying nas 'ong ba gzigs nas bka' stsal pa/ 'od srungs tshur shog/ 'od srungs khyod legs par 'ongs so/
5b2(mdo sde): kye ma gnas brtan 'od srungs kyis ni 'di lta ste/ 'dir 'ong bar bya ba'i phyir yun ring po nas rnam grangs byas so// 'od srungs khyod gdan 'di'i phyed la 'dug cig
5b3(mdo sde): ces/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan 'od srungs la gdan gyi phyed gnang ma thag tu/ de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan de las bskyod pa dang / stong gsum gyi stong
5b4(mdo sde): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ ldeg/ rab tu ldeg/ kun tu
5b5(mdo sde): rab tu ldeg cing / 'jig rten du snang ba chen po yang byung bar gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni/ 'di lta ste/ dper na yul ma ga d+ha'i 'kha
5b6(mdo sde): ba'i snod la lcags kyi thu lum gyis bsnun na 'ur bur zer ba de bzhin du btsun pa 'od srungs chen po la gdan gyi phyed gnang ma thag tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
5b7(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdan las bskyod nas/ de nas de ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di sgra skad chen po 'byin to// de nas tshe dang
6a1(mdo sde): ldan pa 'od srungs chen po chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar
6a2(mdo sde): ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'ad kyi tha dad du phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos gtugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ni
6a3(mdo sde): bdag gi ston pa lags la/ bdag ni nyan thos lags pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos gos sam/
6a4(mdo sde): lhung bzed dam/ gdan nam/ de las gzhan pa'i longs spyod rnams nyan thos rnams kyis longs spyod par rngo mi thogs lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de dag
6a5(mdo sde): ni lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod rten du gyur pa lags shing / bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das las sha na'i ras phyag dar khrod gang dag blangs pa
6a6(mdo sde): de dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das mchod rten du gyur pa lags pa'i slad du ste/ de dag bdag gis ma spyad lags so// bcom ldan 'das de slan chad 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i rnam
6a7(mdo sde): par brtags pa 'am/ gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par brtags pa 'am/ 'dod chags kyis yongs su gdung bas gdungs par gyur
6b1(mdo sde): pa'am/ zhe sdang gis yongs su gdung ba dang / gti mug gis yongs su gdung bas gdungs par gyur par ma dran lags so// bcom ldan 'das mdor na slob par gyur pa bdag gis bcom ldan
6b2(mdo sde): 'das las sha na'i ras phyag dar khrod mnos pa rnams/ mi slob pa'i sa la thug gi bar du spyi bos mnos lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis longs sprad pa'i slad du blangs pa ni ma
6b3(mdo sde): lags kyi/ gdams pa dang rjes su bstan pa las brtsams nas blangs lags so// bcom ldan 'das de dag blangs nas/ sems mtho ba 'am/ dma' bar gyur par ma dran lags
6b4(mdo sde): so/ / bcom ldan 'das sha na'i ras phyag dar khrod de dag chos gos ma mchis pa'i lus la sbyar bar mi dran lags so// bcom ldan 'das phyag dar khrod de dag sug pa ma ser bas reg par
6b5(mdo sde): mi dran lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das gang dang gang du mchi ba de dang der sha na'i ras phyag dar khrod de dag mgos 'tshal cing mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das sha na'i ras phyag
6b6(mdo sde): dngar khrod de dag yan lag mi gtsang ba gang gis kyang reg par mi dran lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das sha na'i ras phyag dar khrod mchod rten du gyur pa de dag bcangs lags so// bcom
6b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das de dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis spangs shing gnang ba lags te/ de dag ni bdag gis bcangs lags so// sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ma lags par de las gzhan
7a1(mdo sde): snyoms par 'jug pa dag gis bdag gzhan du gnas par mi dran lags so/ / bdag ji ltar gnas pa na sa la sa'i 'du shes su ma gyur pa dang / chu la chu'i
7a2(mdo sde): 'du shes dang / me la me'i 'du shes dang / rlung la rlung gi 'du shes su ma gyur pa dang / 'jig rten 'di'i 'du shes dang / 'jig rten pha rol gyi 'du shes su ma gyur pa dang
7a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das gang mthong dang / thos pa dang / bye brag phyed pa dang / rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyis rjes su brtags pa dang / rjes su bsam pa de la yang bdag
7a4(mdo sde): tu 'du shes su ma gyur pa dang / bcom ldan 'das gang 'du shes med pa'i gnas pa dang / 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i gnas pa dang / gang 'du shes
7a5(mdo sde): las yang dag par 'da' ba'i gnas pa dang / gang 'du shes med pa las yang dag par 'da' ba'i gnas pa dang / gang 'du shes kyi gnas pa dang / gang 'du shes
7a6(mdo sde): med pa'i gnas pa dang / gang 'du shes thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba'i gnas pa de yang slob pa'i gnas pa dang / mi slob pa'i gnas par bdag gis yang
7a7(mdo sde): dag par rjes su ma mthong lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das gnas pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams
7b1(mdo sde): / dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong lags te/ bdag ni de ltar gnas lags so// bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na/ nam mkha'
7b2(mdo sde): bla gab ma mchis pa la ming dang / brda dang / gdags pa rnam pa sna tshogs bgyis pa dag/ bcom ldan 'das ming dang / brda dang / gdags pa gang dag gis nam
7b3(mdo sde): mkha' zhes tha snyad du btags pa dang / nam mkha' zhes brdar btags pa dang / nam mkha' zhes rten du bgyis pa dang / bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' zhe 'am/
7b4(mdo sde): gab ma mchis pa zhe 'am/ stong pa zhe 'am/ gsog ce'am/ gsob ce'am/ ya ma brla zhe 'am/ gzung ba ma mchis pa zhi ba ma/ tshad ma mchis pa zhe 'am
7b5(mdo sde): rten ma mchis pa zhe 'am/ blang ba ma mchis pa zhe 'am/ dor ba ma mchis pa zhe'am/ lus ma mchis pa zhe 'am/ ji lta ba bzhin zhe 'am/ yongs su dag pa zhe 'am
7b6(mdo sde): bar snang zhe 'am/ thogs pa ma mchis pa zhe'am/ dngos po ma mchis pa zhe 'am/ bstan du ma mchis pa zhes de dag dang / gzhan yang tha snyad kyi brda tha dad pa rnam pa sna tshogs
7b7(mdo sde): kyis brjod pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ tshad 'di tsam mam/ yongs su bcad pa 'di tsam mam/ mnyam pa 'am/ mi mnyam pa zhes ming ngam/ brda'am/ rten
8a1(mdo sde): rnams kyis 'tshal bar mi nus lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das gang dag de'i phyogs tsam zhig 'tshal ba de dag thams cad kyis kyang / kha dog gam/ dbyibs
8a2(mdo sde): sam/ dmigs pas/ nam mkha' de tshad 'di tsam dang / mchog 'di tsam zhes bgyi ba ma 'tshal lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bgyi ba
8a3(mdo sde): 'am/ sangs rgyas zhes bgyi ba 'am/ ston pa zhe'am/ skyabs she 'am/ dpung gnyen zhe 'am/ gnas she'am/ 'dren pa zhe'am/ rnam par 'dren pa zhe'am/
8a4(mdo sde): yongs su 'dren pa zhe 'am/ sman pa zhe 'am/ gso ba pa zhi 'am/ lam ston pa zhe 'am/ lam brjod pa zhe 'am/ gzhan yang tha snyad tha dad pa'i tshig rnam pa sna tshogs brjod
8a5(mdo sde): pa'i tha snyad kyi tshig gang dag gis mkhas pa rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa dang / bkur ba dang / bsngags pa dang / rab tu bstod pa dang / rab tu bsngags pa dang
8a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das tha snyad kyi tshig gang dag gis 'jig rten mngon par brjod pa'i chos de dag ni/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ma 'tshal mi rten ma mthong lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na
8a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis ya ma brla dang / ngo bo nyid kyis gsob lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na/ sgyu ma mkhan gyis rgyal po rgyal
8b1(mdo sde): rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa/ rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba zhig sprul par gyur la/ bcom ldan 'das de'i thad du gling
8b2(mdo sde): bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnam par rgyal bar bgyi ba la gnas pa mtha' yas pa de dag thams cad lhags shing / bcom ldan 'das de la lus tha dad par yang
8b3(mdo sde): gda' la/ bcom ldan 'das de la sems can lus tha dad par yang mthong lags mod kyi/ bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma mkhan gyis sprul pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de 'di snyam du/ bdag
8b4(mdo sde): gis ni dpung gi tshogs 'di'i bdag po bya zhing / gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rjes su 'jug par bya'o snyam du mi sems lags la/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi po de yang 'di
8b5(mdo sde): snyam du/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'di ni bdag cag gi gtso bo yin pas/ bdag cag ni de'i rjes su 'jug par bya'o snyam du mi sems lags mod kyis/ de dag de'i rjes su
8b6(mdo sde): 'jug par bgyid par yang gda' lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du chos de dag gi chos nyid gang lags pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ nyan thos
8b7(mdo sde): sam/ slob pa'am/ mi slob pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ so so'i skye bo ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das chos nyid de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid dmigs/
9a1(mdo sde): pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid mngon pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid rten pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid dmigs pa 'am/ rang
9a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid mngon pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid rten pa 'am/ nyan thos kyi chos nyid dmigs pa 'am/ nyan thos kyi chos nyid mngon pa 'am/ nyan thos kyi
9a3(mdo sde): chos nyid rten pa 'am/ so so'i skye bo'i chos nyid dmigs pa'am/ so so'i skye bo'i chos nyid mngon pa 'am/ so so'i skye bo'i chos nyid rten pa 'am/ gzugs kyi chos nyid
9a4(mdo sde): dmigs pa 'am/ gzugs kyi chos nyid mngon pa'am/ gzugs kyi chos nyid rten pa'am/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i chos
9a5(mdo sde): nyid dmigs pa 'am/ rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid mngon pa 'am/ rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid rten par mi 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das chos nyid de la gzugs stong pa
9a6(mdo sde): dang / 'dis gzugs stong pa dang / 'di la gzugs stong pa dmigs pa dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa dang
9a7(mdo sde): 'dis rnam par shes pa stong pa dang / 'di la rnam par shes pa stong pa dmigs pa dang / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa stong pa dang / 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa stong pa dang
9b1(mdo sde): / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa stong pa dmigs pa dang / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid stong pa dang / 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid stong pa dang / 'di la de bzhin
9b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i chos nyid stong pa dmigs par mi 'gyur lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du/ de la nyan thos ma mchis/ nyan thos kyi chos nyid ma mchis/ so so'i skye bo ma mchis
9b3(mdo sde): so so'i skye bo'i chos nyid kyi bar du ma mchis lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na/ sgyu ma mkhan gyis 'khor los sgyur ba 'am/ dpung gi tshogs sprul pa de la 'khor los
9b4(mdo sde): sgyur ba ma mchis/ dpung gi tshogs ma mchis lags so// sgyu ma la ma mchis/ sgyu ma'i chos nyid la ma mchis/ sgyu ma mkhan rnams la ma mchis lags so// sa lam sa
9b5(mdo sde): tshul ma mchis/ me la ma mchis/ rlung la ma mchis/ nam mkha' la ma mchis/ rnam par shes pa la ma mchis lags so// sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang /
9b6(mdo sde): nam mkha'i khams rnams la ma mchis/ rnam par shes pa'i khams la ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni de dang 'dra lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de dag
9b7(mdo sde): la bdag ni rlom sems su mi bgyid/ de dag la bdag ni byung bar ma gyur/ de dag bdag gis ni ma spras lags so// bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag ni yon tan gyi chos rnams nyid
10a1(mdo sde): las dben pa lags pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams rjes su dran par bgyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das de ni lam lags/ de ni tshul lags
10a2(mdo sde): te/ lam de la gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo lam de rjes su thob pa rnams ni 'di snyam du/ gzhan yang dag par blangs la 'jug par bya zhing / ston pa yang
10a3(mdo sde): gzhan btsal bar bya la/ dge sbyong ngam bram ze gzhan smra ba'i gdong du gyen du blta bar bya zhing / tshe dang ldan pa 'di ni shes bzhin pas shes/ mthong bzhin pas mthong /
10a4(mdo sde): yang dag pa'i lta ba yang 'dogs bzhin pas 'dogs par byed do snyam du mi sems lags te/ de ni gnas ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das gnas pa 'di la ni bdag som nyi
10a5(mdo sde): ma mchis pas thob par gnas lags so/ / chos kyi sgo de yang rjes su thob pas gnas lags so// chos thams cad ni 'di lta ste/ dben pa'i tshul dang / skye ba ma mchis pa'i
10a6(mdo sde): tshul dag gis tshul gcig pa lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la chos kyi the tsom zhu bar 'tshal ba
10a7(mdo sde): lags la/ de bzhin gshegs pas kyang bdag la skabs phye ba lags te/ dbang po'i drag phug nas 'od ma'i tshal 'dir phyin pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag 'dir
10b1(mdo sde): mchis pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan gyi phyed gnang ste/ bdag la gnang ba na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rab tu bur bur zhing rnam pa drug tu yang rab tu
10b2(mdo sde): g.yos lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'di snyam du/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni bdag nyid chen po'i chos dang ldan pa de lta bu dang / rgya chen po'i chos dang ldan pa de lta bu
10b3(mdo sde): dang / slob dpon ma mchis shing rang byung ba lags kyang / thugs rje chen po'i tshul la bzhugs shing / lhag pa'i nga rgyal ma mchis pa dang / nga rgyal ma mchis pa la
10b4(mdo sde): bzhugs nas/ bdag la gdan gyi phyed gnang ba ngo mtshar lags so snyam bgyid de/ bcom ldan 'das dper bgyid na/ mi dbul po 'tsho ba ngan pa tshegs kyis 'tsho ba zhig
10b5(mdo sde): tshegs kyis khyim gyi phun sum tshogs pa bsgrubs nas/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa'i gan du blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba
10b6(mdo sde): dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / dri bar bgyi ba'i slad du mchis par 'gyur la/ mchis pa de la des stan gyi phyed stsal na/ de nas de 'di snyam du sems lags te/ rgyal po la
10b7(mdo sde): blta ba dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir bdag song du zin kyang / bdag gis blta ba 'am/ phyag bya bar yang dka' bar 'gyur na/ gsol ba lta cig smos/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas
11a1(mdo sde): dbang bskur bas/ bdag phyin ma thag pa la stan gyi phyed byin du zin kyang / 'di ni ngo mtshar ro snyam bgyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du/ chos kyi rgyal
11a2(mdo sde): po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni rang byung ba/ slob dpon ma mchis pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang bsnyen par dka'
11a3(mdo sde): zhing rtogs par dka' ba lags na/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshags pa dgra bcom pa yang
11a4(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la chos kyi the tsom zhu ba dang / blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du/ bdag ji lta ji ltar mchis pa na/ bcom ldan
11a5(mdo sde): 'das bdag 'di snyam du sems lags te/ bdag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa blta ba rnyed cing / phyag bgyi ba rnyed la/ bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / zhu ba dang / yongs su zhu
11a6(mdo sde): par bgyi ba rnyed de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis da ltar bdag 'dir lta mchis pa la gdan gyi phyed gnang ba ni/ bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do snyam bgyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das
11a7(mdo sde): ji ltar mi dbul po des 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de la blta ba nyid dang / phyag bgyi ba nyid kyang ngo mtshar lags pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'di snyam du sems te
11b1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa ni byams pa chen po dang ldan zhing / thugs rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang ldan pa lags kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan
11b2(mdo sde): gang dag lags pa de dag ston pa ma gtogs par/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'di snyam du/ bdag ni phul dang / bdag ni mchog dang / bdag ni khyad par du 'phags pa'o snyam du mi
11b3(mdo sde): dgongs pa ni ngo mtshar lags te/ bdag ni 'di snyam du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sangs rgyas kyi yon tan de dag ni/ 1
11b4(mdo sde): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags so snyam bgyid lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang // bcom ldan 'das kyis
11b5(mdo sde): dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po la bka' stsal pa/ 'od srungs legs so legs so// 'od srungs khyod yang legs so// 'od srungs de bzhin gshegs pa ni dpag tu med cing
11b6(mdo sde): dpag tu med pa'i chos dang ldan te/ de ni sbyin pa'i tshad de lta bu dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad de lta bu dang / shes rab kyi bar gyi tshad de lta bu dang / shes rab kyi pha
11b7(mdo sde): rol tu phyin pa'i tshad de lta bu dang / smon lam rnams kyi tshad de lta bu dang / smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad de lta bu dang / thabs kyi tshad de lta bu dang / thabs la mkhas pa'i pha rol
12a1(mdo sde): tu phyin pa'i tshad de lta bu dang / spyod pa'i tshad de lta bu dang / spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad de lta bu dang / rnam par grol ba'i tshad de lta bu dang / rnam par grol ba'i
12a2(mdo sde): pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad de lta bu dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i tshad de lta bu dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad de lta bus dpag par mi nus so//
12a3(mdo sde): 'od srungs bzhi po 'di dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi mnyam pa'i ye shes rnams yin te/ de dag dang ldan na de bzhin gshegs pas 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra sgrogs par byed pa'o//
12a4(mdo sde): bzhi gang zhe na/ tshul khrims mnyam pa nyid dang / ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid dang / shes rab mnyam pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyam pa nyid de/ 'od srungs mi mnyam
12a5(mdo sde): pa'i ye shes bzhi po de dag ni gang dag dang ldan na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs shing / seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrogs par byed pa'o//
12a6(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas 'jig rten bsam yas na// sangs rgyas ye shes mtha' yas te// sems kyi las
12a7(mdo sde): ni sbyangs pas na/ / de dag seng ge'i sgra sgrogs byed// seng ge'i sgra sgrogs byed pa ni// mu stegs gzhan rnams skrag par 'gyur// chos kyi chos nyid thos nas su// g.yang
12b1(mdo sde): sar rab tu ltung bar 'gyur/ / bdag tu 'du shes gang gnas dang // sems can 'du shes gang gnas pa// 'od srungs de dag bstan 'di la// mu stegs can zhes ngas bshad do//
12b2(mdo sde): dngos po'i 'du shes gang gnas dang // nga ying zhes rten pa dang // 'od srungs de dag bstan 'di la// mu stegs can zhes ngas bshad do// gang dag tshul khrims phung po dang /
12b3(mdo sde): bsam gtan rnams dang thos mang gis// rlom sems rnam rmongs de dag ni// 'od srungs mu stegs can rnams so// bdag ni mchog shes 'dod chung dang // rab tu dben la gnas pa
12b4(mdo sde): dang / chos gos ngan pa 'chang snyam pa// 'od srungs de ni mu stegs so// dper na nam mkha' 'di la ni// lag pa bskyod kyang thogs med cing // dper na mkha' la rdul gyis
12b5(mdo sde): / kyang // nam yang gos par mi 'gyur ba// de bzhin 'od srungs ngas bstan pa'i// chos 'dir gang dag gnas de dag/ nyon mongs rnams kyis mi gos te// mkha' la rdul dang sbyin
12b6(mdo sde): bzhin no/ / ji ltar mkha' la mo yis me tog spos rnams dang // de bzhin 'phreng ba byug pa rnams kyis 'dir mchod kyang // bdag mchod la la skye 'gyur 'jig par 'gyur ro zhes/
12b7(mdo sde): de la blo gros kyang ni 'byung bar mi 'gyur dang // ji ltar nam mkha' de la gos par mi 'gyur dang // ji ltar de yi rang bzhin gos par mi 'gyur dang // ji ltar de yi rang bzhin ngo bo nyid
13a1(mdo sde): kyis gsob/ / de bzhin dge sbyong dag la stong pa'i chos rnams so// ji ltar gang gis nam mkha' bsdigs pa dang / ji ltar nam du yang na gshe bar mi 'gyur ba/
13a2(mdo sde): de bzhin dge sbyong dag la chos rnams gang dag yin// de dag nam mkha' bzhin du gos pa med chos rnams// chos 'di dge sbyong gang dag legs par bslabs rnams dang // gzhan
13a3(mdo sde): dag slob pa rnams dang slob par 'gyur ba rnams/ / 'di la nam du'ang gang dag chags par mi 'gyur ba// nga yis de dag dge sbyong legs bslabs rnams su bstan// ji ltar
13a4(mdo sde): mkha' la nam yang lag pa mi thogs dang / / rdul dang du ba rnams kyis gos par mi 'gyur dang // ji ltar lam ni nam yang byed par mi 'gyur ba// chos la de bzhin mos pa
13a5(mdo sde): rnams ni dge sbyong yin/ / ji ltar sprin dang bral bar gyur pa'i nam mkha' la// zla ba thogs pa med pas mkha' la 'gro byed kyang // bdag gis bar snang la ni snang bar bya snyam
13a6(mdo sde): du/ de la rnam rtog de ni 'byung bar mi 'gyur bzhin// rgod med bdag nyid dge slong zla ba lta bu yis// sbyin pa'i bdag po'i khyim rnams su ni 'gro bar bya// rgod med nga
13a7(mdo sde): rgyal rnam grol sems dang ldan pa dang / / 'jig rten chos rnams kyis ni ma gos sems ldan bya// khyim rnams la ni nga rgyal spangs nas bsten par bya// der phyin nas kyang chos
13b1(mdo sde): nyid rab tu brjod par bya/ / bde dang rnyed pa'i phyir ni 'dod pa'ang spangs nas su// 'jig rten rnam dag tshul khrims can du gnas par bya/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
13b2(mdo sde): kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po la bka' stsal pa/ 'od srungs longs shig/ longs la rang gi stan la 'dug cig/ 'od srungs khyod la chos kyi the tsom ji snyed yod pa
13b3(mdo sde): dag de bzhin gshegs pa la dris shig dang / 'od srungs ngas dris pa la lan btab pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po sa
13b4(mdo sde): steng de nas langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du bya ba
13b5(mdo sde): mngon par 'du mdzad pas/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma ji snyed gnas pa de dag thams cad rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal
13b6(mdo sde): byaka lan ta ka gnas pa ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ dge slong
13b7(mdo sde): dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang
14a1(mdo sde): lto 'phye chen po gang dag yin pa de dag kyang / 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas par zhugs te/ de dag zhugs nas mtha' yas shing dpag tu med par shes par
14a2(mdo sde): 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad pas/ stong gsum gyi
14a3(mdo sde): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / tshangs pa chen po dang / 'od gsal dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung
14a4(mdo sde): ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / 'og min gyi lha'i bu ji snyed pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga
14a5(mdo sde): la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu
14a6(mdo sde): 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad pas/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / ma dros pa dang
14a7(mdo sde): snam bu'i dbang phyug dang / go'u ta ma dang / dga' bo dang / nye dga' dang / gzi can dang / 'jog po dang / rab mdzes dang / e la'i 'da' dang / de dag dang / gzhan yang
14b1(mdo sde): klu bye ba phrag stong sangs rgyas kyi mthus bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod cing / rgya chen po rgya chen
14b2(mdo sde): po'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen
14b3(mdo sde): dang / dge bsnyen ma de dag thams cad kyang / sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas par zhugs nas/ gcig la gcig nyam nga ba med pas 'khod par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i
14b4(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu
14b5(mdo sde): khyod longs la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan shoms shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la bzhugs nas/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yang dag par ston
14b6(mdo sde): par 'gyur/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa bsgrub pa'i spyod pa yang dag par ston par 'gyur/ sems can thams cad yang dag par tshim pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs yang dag par
14b7(mdo sde): ston par 'gyur/ sems can thams cad chos la yang dag par gzhol ba'i tshul gyi sgo rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya yang dag par ston par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
15a1(mdo sde): kyi spyod pa bsgrub pa yang dag par ston par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bsgrub pa yang dag par ston par 'gyur/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba bsgrub pa yang dag
15a2(mdo sde): par ston par 'gyur/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrub pa yang dag par ston par 'gyur ba nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrub pa'i bar du yang dag par ston par 'gyur/ chos thams
15a3(mdo sde): cad kyi tshul gyi sgo bsgrub pa yang dag par ston par 'gyur/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po bsgrub pa yang dag par ston par 'gyur/ sems can thams cad kyi gnas pa'i spyod pa bsgrub pa yang dag par
15a4(mdo sde): ston par 'gyur/ 'khor bzhi yang dag par tshim par byed par 'gyur/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang
15a5(mdo sde): lto 'phye chen po'i 'khor yang yang dag par tshim par byed par 'gyur/ 'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba dang / de bzhin du da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la
15a6(mdo sde): ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa dang / spyod pa dang / smon lam rnams dang / ye shes kyi phyogs tsam zhig yang dag par ston par 'gyur ro//
15a7(mdo sde): de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan 'phang du
15b1(mdo sde): tshangs pa'i 'jig rten srid cig bshams so/ / steng gi bar snang la yang bcom ldan 'das kyi 'chag sa rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ ka tsa lin da'i gos ltar reg na bde ba/ srid
15b2(mdo sde): kyi tshad ni stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams dang ldan pa/ rgyar ni dpag tshad bdun brgya dang ldan pa zhig byas so// 'chags de la yang rtsig pa rim pa bdun dang / rta babs bdun dang / stegs bu
15b3(mdo sde): rim pa bdun dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rim pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor ba sprul to// 'chags de'i g.yas g.yon du yang 'di lta ste/ gser dang / dngul dang / shel
15b4(mdo sde): dang / bai b+huR+Ya rin po che sna bzhi'i shing ljon pa dag mngon par sprul to// gser las byas pa'i shing ljon pa rnams la dngul gyi lo ma dag dang / shel gyi me tog dag dang / bai DUR+Ya
15b5(mdo sde): las byas pa'i 'bras bu dag dang / dngul las byas pa'i shing ljon pa rnams la gser gyi lo ma dag dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa'i me tog dag dang / shel las byas pa'i 'bras bu dag
15b6(mdo sde): dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa'i shing ljon pa rnams la gser gyi lo ma dag dang / dngul gyi me tog dag dang / shel gyi 'bras bu dag dang / shel las byas pa'i shing ljon pa rnams
15b7(mdo sde): la gser gyi lo ma dag dang / dngul gyi me tog dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa'i 'bras bu dag mngon par sprul to// shing ljon pa thams cad kyi bar dag tu yang yan lag brgyad dang
16a1(mdo sde): ldan pa'i chus bkang ba'i rdzing them skas bzhi dang ldan pa/ them skas de dag kyang rin po che sna bzhi'i gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel las
16a2(mdo sde): byas pa/ gser gyi bye ma bdal ba/ ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar pos khebs pa/ steng gi bar snang la yang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i dra ba'i
16a3(mdo sde): bla res bres pa zhig mngon par sprul to/ / 'chag sa de yang dar gyi lda ldi mang pos sbyangs pa/ bdug spos dri zhim pos bdugs pa/ mi bdun gyi srid tsam du me tog sna tshogs kyis
16a4(mdo sde): gcal bkram pa zhig mngon par sprul to/ / ut+pal dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po de dag la yang mo'u 'gal gyi bu dang 'dra ba'i dge slong dag mngon par sprul to//
16a5(mdo sde): de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos rdzu 'phrul gyis byas pa'i gdan de lta bu de mngon par sprul te// bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du phyin nas 'di skad ces gsol
16a6(mdo sde): to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gdan bshams lags na/ de'i dus la dbab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
16a7(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu khyod kyis gdan bshams zin tam/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bshams lags so//
16b1(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yul mtha' yas pa la dmigs pa bsgrub pa nges par ston pa la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu
16b2(mdo sde): khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i seng ge'i khri shoms shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la bzhugs nas/ sems can thams cad yang dag par tshim par byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi
16b3(mdo sde): rnam grangs yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur ro/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yul mtha' yas pa la dmigs pa bsgrub pa nges par ston pas
16b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas gdan bshams so/ / gdan de shom pa na byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed 'dus pa de dag thams cad kyis/ seng ge'i gdan der rang rang gi bla gos
16b5(mdo sde): dag bting ngo / / de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ bdag gis ni 'di lta ste/ the tsom dang som nyi bsal ba'i phyir/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba
16b6(mdo sde): mngon par 'du mdzad pa gang gis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi spyad pa bsgrub pa dang / 'jug pa bsgrub pa dang / smon lam bsgrub pa dang / zhing bkod pa bsgrub pa dang
16b7(mdo sde): sems can yongs su smin par bya ba bsgrub pa gang dag yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su sangs rgyas kyi
17a1(mdo sde): zhing gi bkod pa 'byung ba dang / nyan thos phun sum tshogs pa 'byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' phun sum tshogs pa 'byung ba dang / chos bstan pa phun sum
17a2(mdo sde): tshogs pa 'byung ba dang / tshe phun sum tshogs pa dang / mdog phun sum tshogs pa dang / gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang / mtshan phun sum tshogs pa dang / dpe byad phun sum
17a3(mdo sde): tshogs pa dang / yang dag pa'i sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / dam pa'i chos rab tu rnam par mi 'jig pa phun sum tshogs pa 'byung ba gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad rang rang gi chos
17a4(mdo sde): gos dag las mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba des mngon par 'du bya'o snyam mo/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das dran pa dang mkhyen bzhin du gang na de la bzhugs
17a5(mdo sde): / bcom ldan 'das gdan de la bzhugs nas kyang / yul mtha' yas pa la dmigs pa bsgrub pa nges par ston pa zhes bya ba sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so//
17a6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de nas de ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis rang rang gi bla gos ji snyed pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan du
17a7(mdo sde): bting ngo / / de dag gis rang rang gi chos gos de dag la bdag nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa nas/ rab tu rnam par mi 'jig pa phun sum
17b1(mdo sde): tshogs pa'i bar du yang mthong ngo / / de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag yang dag par tshim zhing yi rangs te dga' ba dang dang ba la gnas nas/ bcom ldan 'das
17b2(mdo sde): la sgra skad mthun par tshigs su bcad de bstod pa/ cho ga spyod pa yon tan gnas gyur pa// chos rnams kun la dbang ldan bsnyengs mi mnga'// yon tan kun la gnas pas khyod
17b3(mdo sde): mdzes te/ / rgyal ba dbang ldan ting 'dzin yang dag gnas// g.yo dang phywa ni khyod la yong mi mnga'// nga rgyal rgod dang tshul 'chos mi mnga' ste// rig dang rnam grol dag gi spyo
17b4(mdo sde): pa mkhyen/ / ting 'dzin de la gnas pas khyod mdzes so// dbang ldan bsnyengs bral ting 'dzin gnas nas su// rdzu 'phrul mi mtshungs bla na med pa bstan// chags med ye shes
17b5(mdo sde): bstan phyir dbang ldan pa/ / ma 'ongs dus na khyod kyis deng bstan to// mi g.yo go 'phang zhi ba thob snyam bgyid// de ring byang chub la ni mchis snyam bgyid// bdud dpung bcas
17b6(mdo sde): pa rab tu bcom snyam bgyid/ / de ring rig pa rjes su thob snyam bgyid// rgyal bas gang gi 'dus byas stong gzigs pa'i// bla med mig ni thob par 'gyur snyam bgyid// chags med
17b7(mdo sde): ye shes khyod kyi bka' drin la/ / mig kyang chags pa mchis pa yong ma lags// rnam par mthong yang ci yang ma mthong zhing // chos ni gang la'ang zhe 'gras ma mchis te// gang
18a1(mdo sde): la yid ni zhe 'gras ma mchis pa/ / de ni sangs rgyas spyan mchog de lags so// ji ltar rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas spun mchog gis// khams gsum shes la ma
18a2(mdo sde): chags 'jug pa bzhin/ / dngos dang dngos med mnyam mtshungs yid dang ldan// yang dag brtson zhing rang gi mig la gnas// gang tshe rgyal ba ting 'dzin der gnas te// de ring
18a3(mdo sde): de dag kun gyis thob snyam bgyid/ / de dag gis ni gzungs sgo de dag dang // chos la rnam par grol ba'i sgo mchog thob// sgor 'jug yongs su sbyang ba rnam dag pas// rgyal ba'i
18a4(mdo sde): blo ni yongs ye nyams mi 'gyur/ / sbyin pa chen po'i rnam smin de 'dra ste// khrims chen yon tan de dag de 'dra lags// shes rab chen po'i yon tan de 'dra ste// sngon chad chos
18a5(mdo sde): de dag ni bstan pa mdzad/ / khyod ni gdan bzhugs bsam gtan mdzad pa na// mi yi dbang po phyogs bcur lhang nger gyur// rgyal sras thugs kyi sras po 'dus de dag/ gang
18a6(mdo sde): nas shi 'phos las ni ci mchis pa/ / lha dang klu dang mi min mi 'am ci// kun la de ring shes pa de 'jug go// kun tu snang bar gyur pa'i ting 'dzin la// gang gis bskal
18a7(mdo sde): byer shes pa de bskyed pa/ / som nyi gcod cing the tsom sel ba yis// mi mchog seng ge bzhin du sgrogs par gyur// bdag dang gzhan la phan pa tshol ba na// 'di ltar sngon
18b1(mdo sde): chad sbyin pa stsal lags te/ / 'di la sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod brtson gang // sems can kun la de 'drar skal ba mnyam// sems can de dag thams cad ma btud par// 'di la
18b2(mdo sde): sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson gang / / sems can kun la kun tu mkhas pas na// 'di la ting 'dzin 'jug dang shes rab mchog/ des na khyod kyis ting 'dzin rnam par sbyangs
18b3(mdo sde): dpa' bo de ring gdan la bzhugs pa la/ / thal mo sbyar nas khyod la zhus lags na// som nyi gcad cing the tsom bsal du gsol// deng 'dir chos la kun tu snang thob cing //
18b4(mdo sde): the tsom bral te snang ba thob gyur pas// sems can gang dag 'byung dang bdag cag la// chos kyi tshul ni yun ring gnas par 'gyur// gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ba ste dang po'o//
18b5(mdo sde): / yang de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa de nyid du pad+ma dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba gzhon nur gyur pa zhig 'dus par gyur te 'dug go// de nas pad+ma dpal gyi
18b6(mdo sde): snying po gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs
18b7(mdo sde): su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'dug go/ / de ltar 'dug pa de'i sems la rnam par rtog pa 'di lta bu byung ste/ bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la chos kyi sgo rnams zhu bar 'dod pa
19a1(mdo sde): yin/ rdo rje'i tshig rnams dang / rgyun mi chod pa'i bsgrub pa'i tshig rnams zhu bar 'dod pa yin/ smra ba thams cad tshar gcad pa bsgrub pa'i chos rnams
19a2(mdo sde): dang rim par phye ba'i tshig rnams dang / chos thams cad bsdu ba'i tshig rnams zhu bar 'dod pa yin na/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dag phyag rgya'i sgo gang
19a3(mdo sde): dag la bslabs na/ chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i mig dang shes pa la mkhas pa nyid rjes su thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kye ma bdag gis bsam pa'i tshogs
19a4(mdo sde): gang dag dang / 'jug pa bsgrub pa gang dag gis go cha bgos pa sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs skye ba la bsam pa bsgrub pa'i tshogs la dgongs par 'gyur snyam mo//
19a5(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis pad+ma dpal gyi snying po gzhon nur gyur pa'o bsam pa thugs su chud cing smon lam dang dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs bsgrub pa thugs su chud nas/ de'i tshe phyogs
19a6(mdo sde): bzhir rnam par gzigs so/ / phyogs bzhir gzigs pa na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer chen po bzhi byung ste/ de dag byung nas 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu
19a7(mdo sde): med pa dag tu dong ngo / / 'od zer de dag kyang shing ljon pa 'am/ rtsig pa 'am/ ri 'am/ sa 'am/ bar snang gang du bab pa de dag thams cad gser gyi kha dog tu kha dog gcig
19b1(mdo sde): par gyur to/ / phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad du yang 'od zer de dag thogs pa med par rab tu dong ste/ de ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na 'od de
19b2(mdo sde): ngag gis reg pa'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis rang gi lus dag gser gyi lus lta bur shes so/ / gang dag 'dod chags kyi yongs su gdung bas yongs su gdungs
19b3(mdo sde): pa dang / zhe sdang gi yongs su gdung bas yongs su gdungs pa dang / gti mug gi yongs su gdung bas yongs su gdungs pa de dag thams cad kyis ni bdag nyid 'dod chags
19b4(mdo sde): chung ba dang / zhe sdang chung ba dang / gti mug chung bar mngon par shes so// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can dmyal ba ji snyed yod pa de dag
19b5(mdo sde): tu sems can skyes pa gang dag sdug bsngal tsha ba/ mi bzad pa/ 'chi ba'i mthar byed pa'i tshor ba nyams su myong ba de dag thams cad kyis ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
19b6(mdo sde): mthu dang / byang chub sems dpa' de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi mthus bde ba snyam du shes par gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ las kyi
19b7(mdo sde): sgrib pas bsgribs pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pas bsgribs pa dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa'i sgrib pas bsgribs par gyur pa'i sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag
20a1(mdo sde): thams cad kyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi mthu dang / byang chub sems dpa' de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis sgrib pa dang bral bar gyur to// de'i tshe sems can rnams
20a2(mdo sde): kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba cher gsal bar bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spu'i khung bu thams cad nas 'od zer dag phyung ste/ 'od zer de dag kyang shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams tshad
20a3(mdo sde): med pa dag 'das so/ / de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / steng dang / 'og tu 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa dag 'das so// de nas
20a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od zer de dag phyung nas/ gsung bsal ba'i sgra mdzad de/ gsung bsal ba'i sgra des kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mngon par go bar gyur to//
20a5(mdo sde): de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dag 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gdugs gcig pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
20a6(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
20a7(mdo sde): y ang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi bod 'di ni nga'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
20b1(mdo sde): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs/
20b2(mdo sde): pa rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gsung bsal ba'i sgra dang / 'od kyi snang ba
20b3(mdo sde): chen po gda' ba de su'i lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i bkod pa
20b4(mdo sde): gcig pas/ byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu nub phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag 'das
20b5(mdo sde): pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes
20b6(mdo sde): la/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod sems can thams cad yang dag par tshim par byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos kyang ston to// 'khor der byang chub sems
20b7(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba 'dus te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad la yang
21a1(mdo sde): dag par gzhol ba'i phyag rgya'i yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgo zhu bar 'dod do/ / dra ba can gyi 'od sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi
21a2(mdo sde): khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa/ tha mi dang bar spyod pa'i go cha bgos pa dag 'khor der 'dus te 'khod do// dra ba can gyi 'od byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha de dag dang ldan pa de dag
21a3(mdo sde): gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag kyang stongs so/ / dra ba can gyi 'od de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skyes pa gang dag yin pa de dag mthong ba dang thos pa yang / byang chub
21a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' de dag gis gces spras byed par nga smra na/ dra ba can gyi 'od gang dag gis de dag mthong nas bkur sti byed dam/ bla mar byed dam/ ri mo byed dam/ mchod pa byed dam/ dri bar byed pa
21a5(mdo sde): lta ci smos/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa de la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//
21a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab
21a7(mdo sde): ba'i go cha bgos pa de dag lta ba'i slad du/ 'jig rten gyi khams der mchi zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams de yang blta bar bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
21b1(mdo sde): rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po drab can gyi 'od la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de'i dus la dbab par shes na song la/ sangs
21b2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing der shes bzhin du yang spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed de na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag bsnyen par dkar
21b3(mdo sde): ba'i phyir ro/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od la lag pa lta bu'i ut+pal byin te/
21b4(mdo sde): dra ba can gyi 'od de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la khyod kyis lag pa lta bu'i u t+pal 'dis mchod cig/ nga'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa de
21b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/ / nyamang ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stob dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam/ spun gsol lo zhes de skad ces gsol cig/ de nas byang chub
21b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te
21b7(mdo sde): lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med grangs med pa dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ga la ba der song ste/ sems kyi skad cig gcig
22a1(mdo sde): gis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der 'dug par gyur to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla can gyi 'od rgyal po'o khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ga lan ta ka/
22a2(mdo sde): gnas pa g.ya ba der song nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der yang song ste byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sem
22a3(mdo sde): dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag dra ba can gyi 'od lags so// bde bar gshegs pa bdag dra ba can gyi 'od lags te/ bcom
22a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo/ / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od la 'di skad ces
22a5(mdo sde): bka' stsal to/ / dra ba can gyi 'od khyod yun ring du 'tsho bar gyur cig/ khyod bde ba dang nad med par gyur cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od bcom ldan
22a6(mdo sde): 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
22a7(mdo sde): gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa// bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la
22b1(mdo sde): gnas sam zhes spyan gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa des/ bcom ldan 'das la la
22b2(mdo sde): pa lta bu'i ut+pal 'di yang bskur lags na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od las lag pa lta bu'i ut+pa la bzhes su gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
22b3(mdo sde): kyis lag pa lta bu'i ut+pa la bzhes nas/ byang chub sems dpa' ma pham pa la byin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' ma pham pas lag pa lta bu'i ut+pa la de thogs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bzang
22b4(mdo sde): skyong la sogs pa lnga brgya la smras pa/ rgan rabs dag lag pa lta bu'i ut+pa la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas byin pa'o// de nas bzang skyong la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya po de dag gis lag pa lta
22b5(mdo sde): bu'i ut+pa la de thogs/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag de ltar yang dag par zhugs pa lags na/ ci bdag cag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na
22b6(mdo sde): sems can gang dag gis ming thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das lag pa lta bu'i ut+pa la 'di ni byang chub
22b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' ma pham pas bdag cag la sbrul lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis ni lag pa lta bu'i ut+pa la 'di rang gi smon lam gyi stobs dang / spyod pa'i stobs dang / bsam pa'i stobs dang
23a1(mdo sde): sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba'i stobs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'debs pa'i slad du/ lag pa lta bu'i ut+pa la de gtor bar bgyi'o//
23a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das shar phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa dag dang / gang dag ma byung ba dag dang
23a3(mdo sde): 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag dang / 'byung ba'am 'jig pa der yang bcom ldan 'das gtor bar bgyi'o// de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / de bzhin du nub phyogs dang / de bzhin du byang phyogs dang / de bzhin
23a4(mdo sde): du 'og gi phyogs dang / de bzhin du steng gi phyogs dang / de bzhin du phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnams na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed byung ba dang / 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i 'jig
23a5(mdo sde): rten gyi khams de dag tu yang gtor bar bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das gang su dag gis lag pa lta bu'i ut+pal de mthong bar gyur pa de dag thams cad ut+pa la'i ji sdom par gyur cig/ de dag thams cadatha
23a6(mdo sde): na med pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur cig/ de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du yang mchi bar gyur cig/ de dag gis lag pa lte bu'i ut+pa la de gtor nas/ de nas de ma thag tu
23a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pas reg ste/ lag pa lta bu'i ut+pa la de bcom ldan 'das kyis reg nas kyang / de nas de ma thag tu skad cig de nyid la ut+pa la de'i nang nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
23b1(mdo sde): phyed mngon par byung zhing / ut+pa la re re las kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i phyed mngon par byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i phyed po de dag gis/ gang dag chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur mi shes
23b2(mdo sde): shing mos par mi byed la/ chos thams cad sgrib pa med pa dang / chos thams cad mtshan nyid med par mi shes shing mos par mi byed/ khong du chud par mi byed pa de dag gi ston pa ni/ de bzhin
23b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa ma yin zhing / de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos dag kyang ma yin no zhes de lta bu'i tshig de dag gsungs te/ gsungs nas kyang bzhud ngo // tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang
23b4(mdo sde): bka' stsal to/ / sgyu ma 'dra chos gzung du med pa ste// gzugs min thams cad chu zla 'dra ba yin// stong pas stong pa'i rang bzhin mi 'dzin pa// chos nyid 'di ni rgyal bas 'di 'drar gsungs
23b5(mdo sde): mtshan nyid med chos rnam dag mtshan nyid yin/ / mtshan nyid med pa'i rang bzhin de 'dra ste// brtags pas stong zhing bdag med chos rnams la// 'dzin pa med cing rtsod pa med par 'gyur/
23b6(mdo sde): gang dag de ltar chos nyid de 'dod pa// de dag ston pa rgyal ba mthu bo che// phyogs bcur 'jig rten spyod pa thams cad la// de 'dra 'di ni de yi byin brlabs so// de ltar de bzhin gshegs
23b7(mdo sde): ba'i sprul pa de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa de dag gsungs nas phyogs bcur bzhud do/ / / bam po gnyis pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la
24a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od kyis ji skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu de dag gis ci tsam du smon lam dag shin tu yongs
24a2(mdo sde): su sbyangs pa dang / sems can gang dag gis de dag gi smon lam de dag thos pa dang / ming yang bsgrags pa de dag sdug bsngal mang pos reg pa'i sdug bsngal de dag las yongs su thar par 'gyur ba dang /
24a3(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba ni ngo mtshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das dang / rigs kyi bu de dag 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'byung ba'i cha/
24a4(mdo sde): ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na// skyes pa 'am bud med la la zhig rin thang ma mchis pa'i nor bu rin po che dri ma thams cad dang bral ba/ phan pa dang bde//
24a5(mdo sde): pa thams cad nye bar sgrub par bgyid pa'i nor bu rin po che de'i yon tan bsgrags pa thos nas/ yongs su btsal bar sems shing / nor bu rin po che de'i mtshan ma dag kyang legs par 'dzin par bgyid
24a6(mdo sde): la/ chab khung sa 'am/ de las gzhan mi gtsang ba dang 'dres pa'i phyogs dag na nor bu rin po che shin tu yongs su byang ba de 'dam du stsal ba mthong zhing / lhag par yang nor bu rin po che de'i khor yug na/
24a7(mdo sde): smig ma mkhan gyi rigs sam/ gdol pa'i rigs sam/ g.yung po'i rigs sam/ de dag las gzhan yang tshegs kyis 'tsho ba dma' ba'i rigs dag mchis par gyur na/ de dag ni nor bu rin po
24b1(mdo sde): che de'i ming yang ma 'tshal na/ yon tan 'tshal bar 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ de ni gnas ma mchis lags so// de nas mi des mi gtsang bar stsal ba'i nor bu rin po che de mthong nas
24b2(mdo sde): nor bu rin po che de'i snod ni mdzes pa ma yin no zhes de skad ces smra bar bgyid la/ de nas dma' ba'i mi de dag 'di skad ces smra bar bgyid de/ khyod kyis gang gis bsngags pa smras pa'i nor bu rin po che de gang
24b3(mdo sde): yin zhes/ de skad ces smras pa dang / mi des nor bu rin po che de bstan la/ de ston pa na/ mi byis pa'i rang bzhin can de dag ma 'tshal bzhin du/ kye mi khyod kyis nor bu rin po che
24b4(mdo sde): de'i yon tan ci'i phyir smras/ khyod kyis gang smras pa'i nor bu rin po che de'i yon tan de dag ni yod pa ma yin no// khyod ni brdzun du smra ba/ gzhan du smra ba ste/ khyod kyis tshig de dag yid mi ches so zhes/
24b5(mdo sde): smras la// de'i tshe mi des nor bu rin po che de mi gtsang ba'i gnas de nas mngon par bteg cing blangs nas mchis te/ de nas nor bu rin po che de phyung nas mi de mchis ma thag tu/ mi dbul ba'i rang
24b6(mdo sde): bzhin can de dag gcig la gcig shin tu rab tu rnam par 'khrug par gyur nas/ de'i rjes la gnod pa mang pos yongs su bskor ba de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu
24b7(mdo sde): dang ldan pa rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed dbul pos bltams par mchis lags te/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar mi gtsang ba'i 'dam gyi snod du stsal ba'i nor bu rin po che de mkhas pa'i rang
25a1(mdo sde): bzhin can gyi mi des ngo 'tshal ba de lta bur ni/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ni bdag cag blta bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bde ba thams
25a2(mdo sde): cad nye bar bsgrub par bgyid pa'i nor bu rin po che de legs par sbyangs shing rnam par dag pa de lta bur ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
25a3(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa de dag blta bar bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das ji ltar nor bu rin po che de'i khor yug na/ dma' bas 'tsho ba dbul pos dma' ba'i mi de dag gnas pa de lta bur
25a4(mdo sde): ni/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na/ de dag las gzhan pa'i sems can rnams blta bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar skyes pa 'am/ bud med kyis nor bu rin po che de'i yon tan
25a5(mdo sde): dag thos nas/ nor bu rin po che de yongs su btsal bar sems shing / mi gtsang ba'i snod na mchis pa'i nor bu rin po che de mthong nas kyang / nor bu rin po che de'i snod de ni 'tsham pa ma yin no zhes smra bar
25a6(mdo sde): bgyid pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang dag lags pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni 'tsham pa
25a7(mdo sde): ma yin no zhes/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa de dag gi bsngags pa brjod lags so// bcom ldan
25b1(mdo sde): 'das dper btsu n+tu/ skyes pa'am bud med kyis nor du rin po'i de'i yon tan dgathos nas yongs su btsal bAr sems shing / migatsang ba'i snod na mchis pa de snang mthong nas/ snod don/
25b2(mdo sde): 'tsham pa ma yin no zhes tshig smra bar bgyid pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
25b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go tshogos pa de dag gi yon tan gyi bsngags pa thos nas blta ba'i slad du/ bdag cag 'dir mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams
25b4(mdo sde): 'dir mchis nas/ bdag gis ni 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gnod pa brgya phrag du mas bltam zhing / sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu dang ldan pa dag gis bltam par mthong lags so//
25b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das dper bgyid na/ 'dam du stsal pa'i nor bu rin po che de'i 'od de mi 'dor ba de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
25b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa de dag gi 'od de mi 'dor lags te/ 'dir ni sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang mos pa chung ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od
25b7(mdo sde): 'dom gang tsam du byin gyis rlob par mdzad lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das dper bgyid na/ mi re nor bu rin po che de'i yon tan dag sgrogs pa na/ mi dbul ba'i rang bzhin can de dag mngon
26a1(mdo sde): par yid mi ches pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od shin tu rgyas pa 'am/ smon lam chen po 'am/ rnam par 'phrul
26a2(mdo sde): pa chen po 'am/ / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dag la'ang yid ches par mi bgyid na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi la lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das dper bgyid na
26a3(mdo sde): mi des mi gtsang ba'i snod de nas nor bu rin po che de blangs nas mchis la/ de mchis ma thag tu yang sems can de dag gnod pa rnam pa du mas shas cher yongs su bskor ba de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das
26a4(mdo sde): debazhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du mchis nas/ 'di lta bu'i mdo sde 'dzin pa// byang
26a5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' yang dag par 'dzin du stsol ba rnams gcig la gcig rab tu rnam par 'khrug par 'gyur zhing / chos kyi sgra yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur la/ chos ma lags pa nyid kyi sgra 'byung ba kho nar
26a6(mdo sde): bas so zhes/ de skad ces gsol ba lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can de dag ni chos ma lags pa la gnas par 'gyur zhing / chos ma lags pas 'tsho ba nyid yang dag
26a7(mdo sde): par blangs nas gnas par 'gyur la/ gcig la gcig 'thab mo dang / sun 'byin pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / smod pa la 'jug par bgyid par 'gyur te/ de dag gcig la gcig
26b1(mdo sde): dge ba'i chos las nyams nas/ sdug bsngal thob par 'gyur zhing / de dag chos sogs pa dang / dge ba sogs pa lhur len par mi 'gyur ba'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi
26b2(mdo sde): bu 'am/ rig kyi bu mo don 'tshal ba/ don yongs su tshol bar 'tshal ba/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yang dag par bsgrub par 'tshal ba dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa pas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams
26b3(mdo sde): 'dir skye bar mi bgyi na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pas lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na/ sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa dang /
26b4(mdo sde): yang sos dang / thig nag dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / de dag las gzhan pa sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag la skad cig thang cig yud tsam yang
26b5(mdo sde): bde ba mi dmigs pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa de'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i gdugs gcig pa na/ byang chub
26b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' gang dag mchis pa de dag gis/ / 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na/ sems can mnar med par skyes pa rnams dang 'dra bar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dir
26b7(mdo sde): skyes pa de dag la yang bde ba ci yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong lags so/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bde ba gcig pu mchog tu gyur pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can de dag ni rang bzhin
27a1(mdo sde): gyis bde ba lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can 'dir skyes pa rnams kyis de mngon par yid ches par dka' bar 'gyur bar smra lags te/ bcom ldan 'das 'on kyang
27a2(mdo sde): chos kyi the tsom bcad pa dang / chos kyi phyag rgya'i sgo mnyan pa'i slad du/ gang gi don du bdag 'dir mchis pa de bcom ldan 'das las bdag cag thos par 'tshal lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom
27a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das bde ba dang sdug bsngal de dag thams cad mi rtag pa lags pa'i slad du'o/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas las gang la bde ba ma mchis pa
27a4(mdo sde): dang / sdug bsngal ba ma mchis pa dang / rtag pa ma mchis pa dang / mi rtag pa ma mchis pa dang / rtog pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa dang / dngos po ma mchis pa dang / dngos po ma
27a5(mdo sde): mchis pa ma mchis pa dang / 'dus byas ma mchis pa dang / 'dus ma byas ma mchis pa dang / gdags pa ma mchis pa dang / gdags pa ma mchis pa ma mchis pa dang / 'jig rten pa ma mchis
27a6(mdo sde): pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa ma mchis pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa ma mchis pa dang / zag pa ma mchis pa ma mchis pa dang / bden pa ma mchis pa dang / brdzun pa ma mchis pa dang /
27a7(mdo sde): byang chub ma mchis pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma mchis pa dang / stobs rnams ma mchis pa dang / snang ba ma mchis pa dang / mun pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par rig pa ma mchis pa dang
27b1(mdo sde): rnam par rig pa ma lags pa ma mchis pa dang / 'bras bu ma mchis pa dang / 'bras bu ma lags pa ma mchis pa dang / lam ma mchis pa dang / lam ma lags pa ma mchis pa dang /
27b2(mdo sde): 'jug pa ma mchis pa dang / mthar thug pa ma mchis pa dang / 'jig rten ma mchis pa dang / 'jig rten nas nges par 'byung ba ma mchis pa rnam pa de lta bu'i chos thos par 'tshal
27b3(mdo sde): lags so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bsod nams kyi tshogs las yang dag par byung ba/ kun rtog pa las byung ba'i bde ba de dag dang / gzhan thams cad 'jig rten la bstan
27b4(mdo sde): par bgyi ba'i slad du'o/ / bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni bstan du mi rung lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de la stobs rnams ma mchis/ mi 'jigs pa rnams ma mchis rdzu 'phrul
27b5(mdo sde): ma mchis/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ma mchis/ kun brjod pa ma mchis/ kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul ma mchis/ rjes su bstan pa ma mchis/ rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul ma mchis lags so// mi 'jigs
27b6(mdo sde): pa rnams ma mchis shing / stobs rnams ma mchis la/ bde ba ma mchis shing / sdug bsngal ma mchis lags te/ de dag thams cad ni rlom sems lags shing / de dag
27b7(mdo sde): thams cad ni g.yo ba lags pa'i slad du'o/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid rjes su thob pa dang / rjes su ma thob pa'i slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni de bzhin gshes/
28a1(mdo sde): pa zhes bgyi ba'i grangs su mchi ba ma lags te/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni g.yo ba dang / rlom sems dang / g.yos pa dang / spros pa lags pa'i slad du'o//
28a2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pas ni bden pa 'am/ brdzun pa 'am/ 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas sam/ zag pa dang bcas pa'am/ zag pa ma mchis pa 'am/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas
28a3(mdo sde): pa 'am/ kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa 'am/ 'jig rten pa 'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa 'am// tshul khrims sam/ 'chal pa'i tshul khrims sam/ stobs rnams sam/ stobs ma mchis pa 'am
28a4(mdo sde): mi 'jigs pa 'am/ mi 'jigs pa ma mchis pa 'am/ sbyin gnas sam/ sbyin gnas ma lags pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ sangs rgyas sam/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am
28a5(mdo sde): nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ smon lam rnams sam/ byin gyis brlabs rnams kyi rlom sems thams cad yang dag par bcom zhing lam yongs su mkhyen te/ des na de bzhin gshegs
28a6(mdo sde): pa ni bag tsha ba mi mnga' bar seng ge lta bu dang / glang po che lta bu'i sgra sgrogs par mdzad lags so// de bzhin gshegs pa ni bzhed na mi mthun pa rnams la mi mthun pa'i 'du shes can du gnas par
28a7(mdo sde): mdzad/ mthun pa rnams la mthun pa'i 'du shes can du gnas par mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa ni bzhed na dran pa dang ldan ni mkhyen bzhin du de gnyis kas kyang btang snyoms par gnas par
28b1(mdo sde): mdzad do/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa de dag ni/ sangs rgyas kyi gnas pa dag dang / rang byung gi gnas pa dag dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang yang
28b2(mdo sde): thun mong ma lags pa'i gnas pa dag lags na/ de dag las gzhan pa'i sems can tha chad rnams dang thun mong ma lags pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du thun mong ma
28b3(mdo sde): lags she na/ de las gzhan pa'i sems can tha chad kyis de lta bu'i gnas pa de dag dang / de snyed kyi gnas pa de dag dang / yun ji srid nas gnas pa de dag dang / sbyor ba de lta bu'i gnas pa
28b4(mdo sde): de dag dang / bde ba de lta bu'i gnas pa de dag 'tshal bar rngo mi thog cing / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dang bral ba'i sems can rnams kyis gnas pa de dag 'tshal bar rngo mi thogs pa'o//
28b5(mdo sde): slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das de dag ni sems can gzhan dag gi spyod yul ma lags shing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa de lta bu de dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod
28b6(mdo sde): yul ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das spyod yul ma lags shes bgyi ba ni/ spyod pa ma mchis shing rnam par spyod pa ma mchis pa ste/ de bas na spyod yul ma lags shes bgyi'o//
28b7(mdo sde): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de la nyan thos dag gam/ rang sangs rgyas dag gi spyong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gnas pa de mtha' yas
29a1(mdo sde): pa'i slad du'o/ / bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du gnas pa mtha' yas lags she na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag gi mos pa dag ni mtha' yas te
29a2(mdo sde): gang gis kyang 'tshal bar rngo mi thog lags so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gnas pa de ni yi ge ma mchis pa lags te/ yi ge ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ba ni brjod du ma
29a3(mdo sde): mchis pa lags la/ yi ge ni brjod pa kho na lags pas/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das de ni rang byung gi gnas pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang dag gnas pa de la rnam par
29a4(mdo sde): smra par mi 'gyur zhing / rab tu 'tshal bar mi 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas shi 'phos bu lags so// gang dag gnas pa de b+h+yo bar chud par mi 'gyu
29a5(mdo sde): ba de dag gis ni gnod pa chen po dang ldan par 'tshal bar gyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa de ni/ bcom ldan 'das don gyi sgo dang chos kyi sgo de lags te
29a6(mdo sde): 'khor rdo drug khri brgyad stong dang ldan pa lags so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa rin bro che'i bkod pa gcig pa'i byang chub ni nam mkha' lta bur tsha de ma mchis shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems
29a7(mdo sde): dpa' chen po de dag sgo gcig pa'i tshad las rjes su thob pa lags so/ / blo'i tshig 'di bstan cing bshad ba na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdun khri bdun stong gis mi rni
29b1(mdo sde): pa med pa'i chos kyi sgo rjes su thob ste/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa de nyid do// de dag thams cad kyis bdag cag gis deng byang chub thob bo// bdag cag gis deng byang
29b2(mdo sde): chub thob bo zhes bya ba'i tshig kyang smras so/ / srog chags bye ba khrag khrig phrag drug cu ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag sems
29b3(mdo sde): dang po bskyed pa nyid kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/ / srog chags bye ba khrag khrig sa ya phrag brgyad ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral
29b4(mdo sde): bskyes so/ / dge slong sum stong ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum
29b5(mdo sde): pa mdzad nas kyang / de nas de ma thag tu de'i tshe 'jig rten du 'od chen po byung bar gyur cing / sa chen po yang g.yos par gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos chos
29b6(mdo sde): gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lhang sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
29b7(mdo sde): to/ bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa dang / 'jig rten du snang ba chen po byung ba dang / 'jig rten du sa cher g.yos pa'i rgyu ni gang lags/ rkyen ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
30a1(mdo sde): stsal pa/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od kyis chos kyi sgo de bstun cing bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' bdun khri bdun stong gis sgrib pa med pa'i
30a2(mdo sde): chos kyi phyag rgya'i sgo thob par gyur cing / kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od kyis sgo'i tshig bstan pa de ni/ nam mkhas yongs su zin pa'i sa phyogs de nyid du sangs rgyas brgyad
30a3(mdo sde): stong las blangs te/ blangs nas kyang de'i rjes la byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od sgrib pa med pa'i chos kyi sgos nges par byung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba
30a4(mdo sde): la mkhas par gyur pa'i phyir ro/ / yang de'i tshe shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa bdun cu rtsa brgyad 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che brtsegs pa gcig pa na/ de bzhin
30a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mtha' yas khyu mchog ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la/ 'khor 'bum phrag du ma la chos kyang ston to//
30a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de'i rgyal tshab byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon ces bya ba 'khor der 'dus par gyur te 'dug nas// des gsung bsal ba'i sgra de thos te/
30a7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i 'od de yang mthong nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mtha' yas khyu mchog la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gsung bsal ba'i sgra dang 'od
30b1(mdo sde): ganga' ba de su'i lags/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mtha' yas khyu gachog gis/ byang chub sems dpa'
30b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po don yod khyu mchog rnam par/ non de la bka' stsal pa/ don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon nub phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa bdun cu
30b3(mdo sde): rtsa brgyad 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/
30b4(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhi la/ 'di lta ste/ sems pa dpe med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams las brtsams nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod sems cani thams cad yang dag par tshim par
30b5(mdo sde): byed pa/ sems can thams cad kyi the tsom gcod pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos kyang ston to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
30b6(mdo sde): rgyas rin chen mtha' yas khyu mchog la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan
30b7(mdo sde): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnye bkur bgyi ba dang / sems pa dpe med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag blta
31a1(mdo sde): ba'i slad du/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bdag mchi bar bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mtha'
31a2(mdo sde): yas khyu mchog gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod de'i dus la dbab par shes na/
31a3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu khyod song la sangs rgyas kyi zhing der shes bzhin du gnas par yang byos shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der skyes pa'i
31a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag skyes pa de dag bsnyen par dka' ba'i phyir ro/ / nga'i tshig gis gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/
31a5(mdo sde): stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes snyun gsol la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la lag pa lta bu'i pad+ma 'di yang phul cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
31a6(mdo sde): po don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon stan las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bskor ba yang byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bdun khri brgya
31a7(mdo sde): stong dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du 'ongs te/ de 'ongs nas de ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed na me tog gi shing ngam/ 'bras bu'i shing ji snyed yod pa de
31b1(mdo sde): dag thams cad kyis/ de'i tshe dus ma yin pa'i me tog dag dang / dus ma yin pa'i 'bras bu dag gtor to// me tog gi char pa yang bab bo// thos kyi char pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag kyang
31b2(mdo sde): bab bo/ / rol mo'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs dag kyang grag go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gan+da
31b3(mdo sde): bAg la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bo spyad tshal te/ lag pa gnyid kas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la bzung ngo // gdong gis kyang yongs su gtugs te/
31b4(mdo sde): tshig 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan
31b5(mdo sde): 'das byang chub sems dpa' don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi/ byang chub
31b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon bkur sti byas pa dang / mchod pa dang / ri mo byas
31b7(mdo sde): par gyur cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnonas las langs te spyan sngar 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
32a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mtha' yas khyu mchog/ bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam
32a2(mdo sde): nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes snyun gsol zhing / bcom ldan 'das la bcom ldan 'das kyis lag pa lta bu'i pad+ma skur ba lags na
32a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse brenye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon las bzhes su gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' don yod rgya mchog
32a4(mdo sde): rnam par gnon las lagru pa m+b+ha bu'i bang+ka ba zhes te/ dkris nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon la bku' stsal pa/ don yong khyu mchon
32a5(mdo sde): narnam par gnon/ / ci bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mtha' yas khyu mchog gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ 'gyur ba mi mnga' 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom
32a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mtha' yas khyu mchog de gnod pa chung zhing / stobs dang ldan la/ 'gyur ba mi mnga'i ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bde bar reg pa la gnas
32a7(mdo sde): legs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma mam pa la lag pa lta bu'i pad+ma byir no// de nas byang
32b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pas lag pa lta bu'i pad+ma de blangs nas tshig gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang dag thun
