90b1(mdo sde): dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing ga zhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi stobs zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
90b2(mdo sde): tu lung bstan to/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes kyi stobs kyis snang ba chen po de mthong ste/ gsung bsal ba'i sgra de yang thos nas/ de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
90b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa ye shes kyi dpal ga la ba der song ste/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
90b4(mdo sde): snang ba chen po de dang / gsung bsal ba'i sgra chen po de su'i legs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa
90b5(mdo sde): sum khri lnga stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs
90b6(mdo sde): te 'tsho zhing gzhes la/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos kyang ston te/ mthu de lta bu de ni de'i yin no// des gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bcom
90b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang blta ba'i slad du
91a1(mdo sde): / 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bdag mchi bar bgyi'o// bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i dus la dbab par shes na song zhig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi
91a2(mdo sde): dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes kyi stobs la lag pa lta bu'i ut+pa la byin te/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de la 'di phul la/ phul nas kyang
91a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das la/ de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi dpal gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam/
91a4(mdo sde): snyun gsol lo zhes de skad ces kyang gsol cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes kyi stobs/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'di
91a5(mdo sde): lta ste/ dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa zhig gis lag pa bskums pa rkyong bar byed pa 'am/ lag pa brkyang ba skum par byed pa'i skad cig dang / yud tsam des song ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams
91a6(mdo sde): mi mjed 'dir 'dug go/ de rgyal po'i khab bod ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
91a7(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang / bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi stobs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
91b1(mdo sde): 'das bcom ldan 'das la/ de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi dbang gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam// stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam/ zhes rgyu/
91b2(mdo sde): gsol zhing / bcom ldan 'das la/ bcom ldan 'das des lag pa lta bu'i ut+pa la 'di yang bskur ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lag pa
91b3(mdo sde): lta bu'i ut+pa la de bzhes te/ bzhes nas kyang bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu ci bcom ldan 'das de snyun mi mnga' bam/ bde bar gnas sam/ stobs dang ldan nam/ 'gyur ba mi mnga'
91b4(mdo sde): 'am/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so// // de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sum khri bzhi stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
91b5(mdo sde): spros brtsegs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsan dan gyi dri ba sung zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang
91b6(mdo sde): ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri ma med ces bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// byang chub sems
91b7(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri ma med kyis snang ba chen po de mthong ste/ gsung bsal ba'i sgra de yang thos so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
92a1(mdo sde): dri ma med kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das snang ba de dang / gsung bsal ba'i sgra grag pa de su'i lags/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/
92a2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu nub phyogs kyi phyogs char 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sum khri ba ni stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
92a3(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod sems can thams cad yang dag par tshim par
92a4(mdo sde): byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos kyang ston to/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das de'i thad du 'jig rten gyi khams der bdag mchi bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das
92a5(mdo sde): des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i dus la dbab par shes na song zhig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med kyi lag par tsan dan gyi thum po byon te/
92a6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de la tsan dan gyi thum po 'di phul la/ nga'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das la/ de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan dri ba sung gnod pa
92a7(mdo sde): chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam// bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam/ snyan gsol lo zhes kyang gsol cig/ de nas byang chub sems
92b1(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri ma med/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bskor ba byas nas/ 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa zhig gis
92b2(mdo sde): lag pa bskums pa rkyong bar byed pa'am/ brkyang bskum par byed pa'i skad cig dang / thang cig dang / yud tsam des 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'dug go/ de rgyal po'i
92b3(mdo sde): khab 'od ma bi tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug
92b4(mdo sde): nas kyang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das la/ de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan gyi dri bsung gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung
92b5(mdo sde): ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam/ zhes snyun gsol zhing / bcom ldan 'das la/ bcom ldan 'das des tsan dan gyi thum bu 'di yang bskur ba
92b6(mdo sde): lags na/ tsan dan gyi thum po 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes te/ bzhes nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'
92b7(mdo sde): dri ma med la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu ci bcom ldan 'das de snyun mi mngab 'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ 'gyur ba mi mnga' 'am/ bde bar reg pa la gnas sam/ gsol pa/
93a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das snyun mi mnga' zhing stobs dang ldan la/ 'gyur ba mi mnga' ste/ bde bar reg pa la gnas lags so// de'i tshe shar phyogs su/
93a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sum khri sum stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dri 'das zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
93a3(mdo sde): rgyas mig btud ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' phan 'dod ces bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
93a4(mdo sde): chub tu lung bstan to/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phan 'dod kyis snang ba chen po de mthong ste/ gsung bsal ba'i sgra de yang thos so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
93a5(mdo sde): dpa' chen po phan 'dod/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mig btud de ga la ba der song nas/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od de dang / gsung
93a6(mdo sde): bsal ba'i sgra de su'i lags/ de nas bcom ldan padas kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing grang
93a7(mdo sde): med pa sum khri sum stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzod ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes
93b1(mdo sde): bya bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yang dag par tshim par byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi
93b2(mdo sde): kyang ston to/ / des gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du/ 'jig
93b3(mdo sde): gyi khams mi mjed der 'drag mchi bar bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i dus la dbab par shes na song zhig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
93b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa mig btud kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' phan 'dod kyi lag par pad+ma chen po'i rgyal po mngon par 'phags pa gcig byin te/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das
93b5(mdo sde): de la pad+ma'i rgyal po 'di phul la/ nga'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das la/ de bzhin gshegs pa mig btud gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa
93b6(mdo sde): yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam/ snyun gsol lo zhes de skad ces kyang gsol cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' phan 'dod/ bcom ldan
93b7(mdo sde): 'das de'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa zhig gis lag pa bskum pa rkyong bar byed pa 'am/ lag pa brkyang ba skum par byed pa'i skad cig dang /
94a1(mdo sde): thang cig dang / yud tsam des 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'dug go// de rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka
94a2(mdo sde): gnas pa ga ya ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyog gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang / bcom ldan

94a4(mdo sde): ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam/ zhes snyun gsol zhing / bcom ldan 'das la/ bcom ldan 'das des pad+ma chen po'i rgyal po 'di yang bskur ba lags na/ pad+ma chen po'i rgyal po 'di bcom ldan 'dra/
94a5(mdo sde): kyis bzhes su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes te/ bzhes nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' phan 'dod la bka' stsal pa/ phan 'dod ci bcom ldan 'das de spyan mi mnga' ngam/ stobs dang ldan nan/
94a6(mdo sde): 'gyur ba mi mnga' 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so// / de'i tshe shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa sum khri nyis stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
94a7(mdo sde): rin chen mtha' yas brtsegs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dkon mchog 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la/
94b1(mdo sde): chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dkon mchog 'byung gnas des/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes tha ma zhes bya ba bla na med pa/
94b2(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes bla mas snang ba chen po de mthong ste/ gsung bsal ba'i sgra chen po de yang thos so// de nas bcom
94b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das de la byang chub sems dpa' ye shes bla mas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das 'od de dang / gsung bsal ba'i sgra de su'i lags/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/

94b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod sems can thams cad kyi bsam
94b6(mdo sde): ba yang dag par tshim par byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos kyang ston to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog 'byung gnas de la/ byang chub sems dpa'
94b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po ye shes bla mas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la bsta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi
95a1(mdo sde): ba dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang blta ba'i slad du/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bdag
95a2(mdo sde): mchi bar bgyi'o/ / bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i dus la dbab par shes na song zhig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes bla ma'i lag par me tog
95a3(mdo sde): dog lnga pa snyim pa gang byin te/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de la me tog kha dog lnga pa snyim pa gang 'di phul la/ bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das la/ de bzhin gshegs
95a4(mdo sde): pa dkon mchog 'byung gnas gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam/ snyun gsol lo zhes de skad ces kyang

95a6(mdo sde): pa zhig gis lag pa bskums pa rkyong bar byed pa 'am/ lag pa brkyang ba skum par byed pa'i skad cig dang / thang cig dang / yud tsam des 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar
95a7(mdo sde): gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der 'dug go// de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der song nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
95b1(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das la/ de bzhin
95b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa dkon mchog 'byung gnas gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam/ zhes snyun gsol zhing / bcom ldan
95b3(mdo sde): 'das la/ bcom ldan 'das des me tog kha dog lnga pa snyim pa gang 'di bskur ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes te/ bzhes nas

95b5(mdo sde): lags so/ / de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sum khri chig stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de
95b6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos kyi glang po che zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems
95b7(mdo sde): dpa' rin chen glang po che zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen glang po ches snang ba chen po de mthong ste/ gsung
96a1(mdo sde): bsal ba'i sgra de yang thos so/ / de nas de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de la zhus pa/ mthu de su'i lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das des
96a2(mdo sde): de la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu nub phyogs kyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sum khri chig stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de

96a4(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos kyang ston to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe shar phyogs su
96a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sum khri 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
96a6(mdo sde): rgyas mchog gi tshogs can zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes tshogs can zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag
96a7(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// / de'i tshe shar phyogs su
96b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sum khri nyis stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
96b2(mdo sde): rgyas lhun po'i phung po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' nges 'dren ces bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
96b3(mdo sde): lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// / de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med
96b4(mdo sde): pa sum khri nyis stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma'i gdugs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegaso ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs gcig pa
96b5(mdo sde): zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i mdzod gcig pa zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/
96b6(mdo sde): byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// // de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi kham/
96b7(mdo sde): grangs med pa sum khri 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thogs pa med pa'i
97a1(mdo sde): 'khor lo zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes khyu mchog ces bya ba bla na med pa
97a2(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs de zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// // de'i tshe shar
97a3(mdo sde): phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sum khri chig stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa can dan gyi dri bsung zhes bya ba bzhug te/
97a4(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ de bzhin gshegs pa des/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes lhur len pa zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya
97a5(mdo sde): ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// // de'i tshe shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa nyi khri dgu
97a6(mdo sde): stong 'dus pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bzang ldan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpung mgo zlum pa zhes bya ba bzhun
97a7(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' khyad par blo gros zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to
97b1(mdo sde): zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba'i bar dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// // de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams
97b2(mdo sde): grangs med pa sum khri chig stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen dpal zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
97b3(mdo sde): dra ba can gyi bod ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi dpal zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par
97b4(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// // de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten
97b5(mdo sde): gyikyikhams grangs med pa sum khri chig stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba'i dpal zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ut+pal
97b6(mdo sde): dmar po'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpab pad+ma mngon 'phags dpal zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzob
97b7(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// // de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten
98a1(mdo sde): gyi khams grangs med pa sum khri tshig stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu zhi ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
98a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas ye shes me tog rin po che'i 'od kyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' mchog gi bkod pa zhes bya ba bla na
98a3(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// / de'i tshe
98a4(mdo sde): shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sum khri chig stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bzang ldan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
98a5(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba 'phags pa'i 'od zer zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i 'od zer ces bya ba bla
98a6(mdo sde): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro//
98a7(mdo sde): de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sum khri 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bzod pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
98b1(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jigs pa dang bag tsha ba thams cad rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des
98b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' bag tsha ba med pa zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya/
98b3(mdo sde): ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// / de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sum khri 'dus pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams lhun po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yong
98b4(mdo sde): de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lhun po'i phung po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang
98b5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' phung po shin tu bshig pa zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes
98b6(mdo sde): bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/ / // de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa nyi khri dgu stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan dang gnod pa
98b7(mdo sde): thams cad las rgal ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos
99a1(mdo sde): kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyi nga ro zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to//
99a2(mdo sde): zhes bya ba nas/ de yang bongs zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbar ro// de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa nyi
99a3(mdo sde): khri dgu stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams chos zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te
99a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba
99a5(mdo sde): dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa nyi khri dgu stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten
99a6(mdo sde): khams shin tu rab gnas zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bcu las 'phros pa'i 'od zer zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang
99a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' bcu las 'phros pa'i 'od zer zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar/
99b1(mdo sde): / snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa nyi khri brgyad stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
99b2(mdo sde): pa rtag tu bla ma'i 'od zer zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
99b3(mdo sde): byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs
99b4(mdo sde): med pa nyi khri brgyad stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spos zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi 'od zer zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/
99b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' mig bzang zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags
99b6(mdo sde): so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/ / de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa nyi khri bdun stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi ngang
99b7(mdo sde): ldang zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mngon 'phags zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa'
100a1(mdo sde): bya/ / snang ba mtha' yas zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar/
100a2(mdo sde): dusnga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa nyi khri bdun stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams lam snang dpal zhes bya ba yod de//
100a3(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bla na med
100a4(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe shar
100a5(mdo sde): phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa nyi khri drug stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bzang po mchog gi dpal zhes bya ba yod de/ de na bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med pa'i dbyangs
100a6(mdo sde): zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
100a7(mdo sde): tulung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams
100b1(mdo sde): grangs med pa nyi khri lnga stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams chos bzangs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dra bcan gyi 'od zer zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes
100b2(mdo sde): la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges/ byang chub sems dpa' khyu mchog ces bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs
100b3(mdo sde): te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa nyi khri bzhi stong 'das pa na/ 'jig
100b4(mdo sde): rten gyi khams pad+ma can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa blos mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems
100b5(mdo sde): dpa' ye shes kyi bsung zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin
100b6(mdo sde): sbyar ro/ / bam po drug pa// de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa nyi khri sum stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi
100b7(mdo sde): khams shin tu rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ batsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub
101a1(mdo sde): / sems dpa' rin po che'i bkod pa zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes/
101a2(mdo sde): bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa nyi khri nyis stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ut+pa la zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de
101a3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa khyu mchog mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' chos 'phags zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag/
101a4(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten
101a5(mdo sde): gyi khams grangs med pa nyi khri chig stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams byang chub yan lag rab gnas zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ut+pa la'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho
101a6(mdo sde): zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i dpal zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang
101a7(mdo sde): 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten khams grangs med pa nyi khri 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi
101b1(mdo sde): khams pad+ma rab gnas zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rang gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub
101b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' rin chen rab rdzogs zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du
101b3(mdo sde): snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/ / de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dri dgu stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ye shes kyi stobs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de
101b4(mdo sde): zhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rin chen thub pa zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par
101b5(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig
101b6(mdo sde): rten gyi khams grangs med pa khrid rgyang skyong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs su rnam par bsgrags pa zhes bya ba yod de/ den de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rnam par bsgrags pa zhes bya ba
101b7(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par bsgrags pa mtha' yas zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
102a1(mdo sde): / chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe shar phyogs su
102a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa khri bdun stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sgrogs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sa lo'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te
102a3(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' sa la rin po che zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/
102a4(mdo sde): de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa khri drug stong 'das pa na/
102a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sa la rin po che zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems
102a6(mdo sde): dpa' kun tu sras zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du
102a7(mdo sde): sbyar ro/ / de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa khri lnga stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa la
102b1(mdo sde): sbyar ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' shing rta bzang po can zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
102b2(mdo sde): chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs
102b3(mdo sde): med pa khri zhi stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gdugs gcig pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i rta zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom
102b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyu skar gyi rta zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes
102b5(mdo sde): bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/ / de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa khri sum stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan thams cad dang bral ba
102b6(mdo sde): zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa brjod pa don yod ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' don yod ming rgal zhes
102b7(mdo sde): bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe sha
103a1(mdo sde): phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa khri nyis stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan bral zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dpal 'byung zhes bya ba bzhugs te/
103a2(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' dpal mtha' yas gzi brjid ces bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas
103a3(mdo sde): de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa khri chig stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten
103a4(mdo sde): gyi khams sdom pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par bsgrags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa'
103a5(mdo sde): dpas byin zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro//
103a6(mdo sde): de'i tshe shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa khri 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba don yod ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa don yod rnam par gnon zhes bya ba bzhugs
103a7(mdo sde): te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' don yod pa'i go cha bgos zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/
103b1(mdo sde): zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa dgu stong /
103b2(mdo sde): 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spros can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spos snang zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des//
103b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rin chen snang zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i
103b4(mdo sde): bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/ / de'i tshe shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa brgyad stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyi nga ro zhes bya ba yod de/
103b5(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med pa'i dbyangs kyi nga ro zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' tha mi dad pa'i go cha zhes
103b6(mdo sde): byab bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro//
103b7(mdo sde): de'i tshe shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa brgyad stong 'on 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od zer zhes bya ba yod de/ den de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par
104a1(mdo sde): bsgrags pa'i stobs kyi 'od zer zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes rnam par bsgrags pa
104a2(mdo sde): zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro//
104a3(mdo sde): de'i tshe shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa brgyad stong kho na 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab kyi rtse mo mngon par
104a4(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi stobs zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
104a5(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi
104a6(mdo sde): khams grangs med pa brgyad stong kho na 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhug
104a7(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ nga
104b1(mdo sde): 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa brgyad stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams/
104b2(mdo sde): / chos shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' ut+pa la'i dpal zhes bya
104b3(mdo sde): babla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe
104b4(mdo sde): shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa brgyad stong kho na 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma mngon par 'phags zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mngon par 'phag
104b5(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' grags sbyin zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan
104b6(mdo sde): to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs
104b7(mdo sde): med pa brgyad stong kho na 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sa'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spos snang zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom
105a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' sa'i dbang phyug gi rgyal po zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang
105a2(mdo sde): 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa brgyad stong kho na 'das pa na/
105a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams gser 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs su rnam par bsgrags pa'i go cha zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan
105a4(mdo sde): 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes rnam par bsgrags pa'i go cha zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes
105a5(mdo sde): bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbar ro// de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa bdun stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams shes
105a6(mdo sde): 'phags zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu sbas pa'i bdag po sprin gyi dbang phyug mar me zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub
105a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' rgyu skar gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin
105b1(mdo sde): du sbyar ro/ / de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa drug stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu shin tu smras zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa/
105b2(mdo sde): snang ba mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' snang ba chen po zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
105b3(mdo sde): chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs
105b4(mdo sde): med pa lnga stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mar me byed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi ye shes mtha' yas 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la
105b5(mdo sde): chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rgyal po snang zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang
105b6(mdo sde): 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de dang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams sgron ma byed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
105b7(mdo sde): gshegs pa rnam pa du ma rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing ka zhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' thogs pa med pa'i go cha zhes bya ba bla na
106a1(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/ / ci'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams sgron ma byed ces bya bar bstan ce na/ 'jig rten gyi khams de na ut+pa la dang / ku mu da dang /
106a2(mdo sde): pad+ma dkar po dag gis khebs pa'i rdzing rgya che zhing yangs pa/ grangs med dpag tu med pa dag yod de/ pad+ma de dag kyang 'dab ma stong pa/ chu mngon par brtol nas gyen du dpag tshad brgyad cur 'phags
106a3(mdo sde): ste/ pad+ma re re las kyang 'od zer 'bum 'byung bar byed cing // gyen du dang thur du yang 'od zer stong 'byung bar byed la/ de bzhin du phyogs thams cad du yang 'od zer stong stong 'byung bar byed pa'i phyir
106a4(mdo sde): ro/ / 'jig rten gyi khams de yang mig mangs ris su bris pa/ rin po che'i 'phreng bas brgyan pa/ rin po che'i skud pas brgyan pa/ mig mangs ris thams cad du yang rin po che las byas pa'i
106a5(mdo sde): shing ljon pa dag skyes par gyur pa/ / gyen du dpag tshad bdun khri bdun stong mngon par 'phags pa/ thad kar ni dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong du yal ga dang / 'dab ma dang / lo ma rab tu song ba'o//
106a6(mdo sde): rin po che'i shing re re las kyang nor bu bye ba phrag brgyad cu zo ba tsam dag rab tu 'phyang ngo // sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na shing ljon pa de dag kyang grangs med dpag tu med do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni pad+ma'i
106a7(mdo sde): 'dab ma de dag dang / nor bu de dag gi 'od kyis rtag tu snang bar byas pa ste/ 'od de yang bcom ldan 'das de'i 'od kyis mog mog por byas pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' thogs pa med pa'i go chas
106b1(mdo sde): snang ba chen po de mthong ste/ gsung bsal ba'i sgra de yang thos so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam pa du ma rnam par 'phrul pa de la/ byang chub sems dpa' thogs pa med pa'i go chas zhus pa// /
106b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das 'od de dang / gsung bsal ba'i sgra de su'i lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das des/ de la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu nub phyogs kyi phyogs char 'jig rten gyi khams grangs
106b3(mdo sde): med pa lnga stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho
106b4(mdo sde): zhing gzhes la/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos kyang ston te/ mthu de lta bu de ni de'i yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das
106b5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bdag mchi bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan
106b6(mdo sde): 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' thogs pa med pa'i go cha'i lag par pad+ma chen po cig byin te/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de la 'di phul la/ nga'i tshig gis de bzhin du
106b7(mdo sde): gsol cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' de bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phye nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'di lta ste/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa
107a1(mdo sde): zhig gis lag pa bskums pa rkyong bar byed pa 'am/ lag pa brkyang ba skum par byed pa'i skad cig dang / thang cig dang / yud tsam des 'jig rten gyi khams de nas
107a2(mdo sde): mi snang bar gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'dug go// de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo
107a3(mdo sde): bos phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nge ba nyung ngam// bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gan
107a4(mdo sde): sam zhes/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa du ma rnam par 'phrul pa snyun gsol zhing / bcom ldan 'das la/ pad+ma chen po 'di yang bcom ldan 'das des bskur ba lags na/ bcom ldan
107a5(mdo sde): 'das kyis bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bzhes su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes te/ bzhes nas kyang bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu ci bcom ldan 'das de spyan mi mnga'
107a6(mdo sde): 'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang ldan nam/ 'gyur ba mi mnga' 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so// 'jig rten gyi khams de'i 'dab chags na
107a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mchog gi tshogs can zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/
107b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal mtshan sa ya na zhes bya ba chos kyi skyes byin nas btang ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams de'i 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs su rnam par bsgrags zhes bya ba yod de/
107b2(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas me tog tshogs kyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab don yod/
107b3(mdo sde): rnam par gnon zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje yang dag gnas zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas me tog mngon par 'phags pa'i
107b4(mdo sde): rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen me zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/
107b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams tsan dan gyi phug ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i lus zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang
107b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab kun tu bltas pa'i nga ro zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rtsi lta bu zhes bya ba yod de/ den de bzhin gshegs pa don yod ming bsgrags
107b7(mdo sde): dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab don yod go cha bgos zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten
108a1(mdo sde): #/ kyi khams sman 'phags zhes bya ba yod de/ den de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas brtson 'grus go cha zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom/
108a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yang dag par byin pa'i bslab pa blangs zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas brgyan ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
108a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa sems bskyed ma thag tu sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyan mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab lag
108a4(mdo sde): na pad+ma zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gdugs gcig pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'phreng ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos
108a5(mdo sde): kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin po che'i 'phreng ba zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma'i 'od zer zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de
108a6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu rab gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo //
108a7(mdo sde): de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba bkod pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal po'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/
108b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yon tan thams cad rab gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan mtha' yas bkod pa zhes bya
108b2(mdo sde): ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yon tan
108b3(mdo sde): mtha' yas bsgrags zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs su rab grags zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs
108b4(mdo sde): te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab spyod pa thams cad 'gyur zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi
108b5(mdo sde): khams lhas brgyan ces bya ba yod do/ / de na de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab
108b6(mdo sde): ye shes 'byung gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams shing thags bzang po can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi 'byung gnas zhes bya ba
108b7(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yon tan 'byung gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig
109a1(mdo sde): rten gyi khams bzang ldan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jig pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang
109a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab srid pa sel ces bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bzang ldan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa b+ha gi ra sa'i sras zhes bya ba
109a3(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang sten te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mi 'jigs thob ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
109a4(mdo sde): shin tu bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab
109a5(mdo sde): bag tsha ba med pa zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'da' chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma mchog gi 'od zer zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing ga zhes
109a6(mdo sde): la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab lag na ye shes zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ut+pa la zhes bya ba yod de/
109a7(mdo sde): den de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes ut+pa la'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab
109b1(mdo sde): yul na mi gnas pa zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jigs rten gyi khams rin chen 'phags zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs
109b2(mdo sde): te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab chos kyi 'byung gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi
109b3(mdo sde): khams zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa smon lam mtha' yas go cha zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems
109b4(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab me tog rab gtor zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu rab gnas zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas rgyal po rab
109b5(mdo sde): gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab chos 'phags zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/
109b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams nags tshal rab gnas zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i phung po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das
109b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rtsi'i rgyal po zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sa la'i dbang pos
110a1(mdo sde): rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha khyad par blo gros zhes bya ba btang ngo //
110a2(mdo sde): de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma'i dpal zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/
110a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu mthong zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams lhun po brtsegs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de
110a4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mes byin zhes bya/
110a5(mdo sde): ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan bral zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas bkod pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la
110a6(mdo sde): chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu yang dag brtags kyi go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan thams
110a7(mdo sde): cad rab gnas zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu gzigs pa'i nga ro zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom
110b1(mdo sde): / ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab kun tu sbas zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'daba' chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen snang zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab 'od
110b2(mdo sde): ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu rab gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi
110b3(mdo sde): khams yon tan kun gyis brgyan ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa khyu mchog mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub
110b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' sman ces bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams byang chub yan lag brgyan ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags pas 'gro ba zhes
110b5(mdo sde): bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' legs par bsam pa sems pa blo gros zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags
110b6(mdo sde): na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdul dang bral ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen me tog 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/
110b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das nges/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab khyad par byin zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sprin ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
111a1(mdo sde): @mtha' yas rnam par gnon ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dran pa rnyed ces bya ba btang /
111a2(mdo sde): ngongo// de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog dra bas kun tu g.yogs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad mos pa'i go cha bgos zhes bya ba bzhugs
111a3(mdo sde): te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' khyad par blo gros zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab tshugs na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgyu skar gyi
111a4(mdo sde): 'phreng ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i gdugs mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des
111a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba mya ngan med ces bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen me tog ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mchog gi tshogs can zhes
111a6(mdo sde): bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab khyu mchog ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi
111a7(mdo sde): khams kun nas spos zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i me tog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems
111b1(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab spos kyi glang po che zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs
111b2(mdo sde): te 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mya ngan bral zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen
111b3(mdo sde): sna tshogs rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub
111b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba mtha' yas sgyur zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mngon du bgrod pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sems bskyed ma
111b5(mdo sde): thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba
111b6(mdo sde): btang ngo / / de'i yang 'da' chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ldan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs rnam par bsgrags pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes
111b7(mdo sde): la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes rnam par bsgrags pa zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i
112a1(mdo sde): snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ka ling ka'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang
112a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab khyad par du 'gro ba zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'da' zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs
112a3(mdo sde): te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab zla ba zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'da' chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na re//
112a4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mes byin zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i
112a5(mdo sde): yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung gnas zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/
112a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba ye shes kyi dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu bde ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de
112a7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi rgyal po rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mi 'jigs
112b1(mdo sde): bzhes bya ba btang / / de'i yang 'ad chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gdugs kyi 'phreng ba me thos kun du rgyas pa zhes bya ba yod de/ den de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med pa'i sgra sa
112b2(mdo sde): ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mig bzangs zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten
112b3(mdo sde): gyi khams rdo rje'iri snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems
112b4(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab brag ces bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba 'phags pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi dpal zhes
112b5(mdo sde): bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab stobs brtan zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten
112b6(mdo sde): gyi khams kun du 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gzi brjid rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byung
112b7(mdo sde): / chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab spyod pa khyad par can zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtho ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu'i blo
113a1(mdo sde): gros zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rgyu dag pa zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab
113a2(mdo sde): chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sgrogs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sred med kyi bu zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des
113a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba kha lo sgyur ba zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i me tog ces
113a4(mdo sde): bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sa bon 'chang zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi
113a5(mdo sde): khams bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje bzhed ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal
113a6(mdo sde): tsha ba dri med rnam par 'thor zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba thams cad ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par dag pa'i blo gros zhes bya
113a7(mdo sde): bapa bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba bkod pa du ma zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
113b1(mdo sde): mya ngan dang gnod pa thams cad yongs su spangs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa phan bzhed ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des
113b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab glang po che'i dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan mtha' yas yongs su rdzogs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
113b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa shin tu yang dag brtags pa'i go cha zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshetsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mchog gi bkod pa zhes bya ba
113b4(mdo sde): btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mnyam pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing kazhes la chos kyang ston
113b5(mdo sde): te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab thogs pa med pa'i go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bzod pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshe
113b6(mdo sde): ba ut+pa la'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyas tshab rtag tu brtson zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
113b7(mdo sde): phyogs kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par bsgrags pa'i stobs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes kha chos kyang ston te/ bcom
114a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab zla ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te btang ngo nge// de'i yang 'dab chags
114a2(mdo sde): na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu snang bar byas zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mtha' yas pa'i lhun po spos kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston
114a3(mdo sde): te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab lag na ye shes zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu brgyan ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
114a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bdud rtsi'i dbyangs zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang
114a5(mdo sde): 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gdugs dkar po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des
114a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshad brtson pa mi gtong zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu brgyan ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa skyes pa dang bud med
114a7(mdo sde): 'gyur bar mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab nga ro mtha' yas zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab
114b1(mdo sde): chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spos mchog dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/
114b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab lag na spos zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tsan dan gyi bsung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mngon par
114b3(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab 'od zer du ma zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab
114b4(mdo sde): chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams kun du spos zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston
114b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin po che'i lhun po zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas mtshan zhes bya ba yod de
114b6(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa sems can kun gyi sems kyi mos pa'i ye shes mthong ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems
114b7(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab ded dpon chen po zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtshan ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan ma med pa'i nga re zhes
115a1(mdo sde): bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha' chos thams cad dben par gnas pa zhes bya ba btang ngo //
115a2(mdo sde): de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas me tog brgyan ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes sbas pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos
115a3(mdo sde): kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ye shes 'od zer zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba
115a4(mdo sde): yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med pa'i dbyangs kyi nga ro zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal
115a5(mdo sde): tshab mig bzangs zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams brtan po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo rnam par gnon zhes bya ba bzhugs te/
115a6(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab legs pa'i blo zhes bya ba 'atang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams brtan
115a7(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srungs zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal
115b1(mdo sde): tsha ba skar ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma'i gdugs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs pa kun gyi khyu mchog ces/
115b2(mdo sde): bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rna ba'i me tog ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig
115b3(mdo sde): rten gyi khams bden pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa don grub ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab
115b4(mdo sde): bden pa mthong ba zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/
115b5(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab kun dga' bo zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gnod pa
115b6(mdo sde): med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa snyan pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab me tog
115b7(mdo sde): dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yod pas rgyags pa yang dag
116a1(mdo sde): tsham sa sate/ 'amashing gshes 'jos pang spyod / cos ldan 'das de/ byang chub sems dpa / sa gyung /
116a2(mdo sde): de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdul med ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnas la chos kyang ston te
116a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab me tog kun tu bltas zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod de//
116a4(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu skar gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba shin tu rnam par 'byed
116a5(mdo sde): ces bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu yangs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i tog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes
116a6(mdo sde): la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen tog ces bya ba 'atang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'jigs med ces bya ba yod de
116a7(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bzang po'i dpal zhes bya ba
116b1(mdo sde): btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dra ba can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dra ba can gyi 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang
116b2(mdo sde): ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab 'od gsal zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
116b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshangs pa'i nga ro zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa'
116b4(mdo sde): rgyal tshab tshangs pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba btang ngo / / 'jig rten gyi khams de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par bgrod pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
116b5(mdo sde): bdud rtsi 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bdud rtsi'i dbyangs zhes bya ba btang ngo //
116b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dmigs pa med ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs pa kun la dgyes par mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te//
116b7(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab thogs pa med pa'i go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams de'i yang 'da' chags na/
117a1(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu bsgrags zhes bya ba yod de/ den de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyis mi shigs pa'i go cha zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la/
117a2(mdo sde): chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab thogs pa med pa'i go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
117a3(mdo sde): rtag tu bzod ldan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems
117a4(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab spobs pa mi chod pa zhes bya ba btang ngo / / 'jig rten gyi khams de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi kham kun tu mthong zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams
117a5(mdo sde): cad gzigs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mtshan ma med pa'i go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams de'i
117a6(mdo sde): yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu blta zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad gzigs zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom
117a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rnam par dag pa'i mig ces bya ba btang ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan thams cad 'byung
117b1(mdo sde): zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas 'byung zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa'
117b2(mdo sde): rgyal tshab mig rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba btang ngo / / 'jig rten gyi khams de'i yang 'dab chags na// 'jig rten gyi khams rdul bral zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'phags
117b3(mdo sde): pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab
117b4(mdo sde): chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ut+pa las rab tu khebs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das
117b5(mdo sde): des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ut+pal dmar po'i dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo / / 'jig rten gyi khams de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+mas rab tu khengs pa zhes bya ba yod
117b6(mdo sde): de de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs su 'phags zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab phyogs kyi lhun po
117b7(mdo sde): zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gis rab tu khebs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa me tog 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te
118a1(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yid gnyis thams cad yang dag bcom zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dad
118a2(mdo sde): chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mar me zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sems can gyi snying po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des
118a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sred med kyi bu zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi 'od ces bya ba
118a4(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bde 'byung zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba'i dpal
118a5(mdo sde): zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi me zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mchog gi nor bu
118a6(mdo sde): can zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mngal med ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos
118a7(mdo sde): kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab chos kyi dbang phyug ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams nges 'dren ces bya ba yod de/
118b1(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa sman pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sman pa'i mchog ces bya ba btang ngo //
118b2(mdo sde): de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams kha dog med ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa tha dad pa med pa'i go cha zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom
118b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab tha mi dad par spyod pa zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu kha dog ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs/
118b4(mdo sde): pa ye shes mtha' yas grags pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yon tan mtha' yas 'byung zhes bya ba bla na
118b5(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ btang ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtsho can zhes bya ba
118b6(mdo sde): yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa tsan ngan gyi bsung gi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes
118b7(mdo sde): kyi spos kyi dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpe med dpal zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas dpe med me tog
119a1(mdo sde): 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yang dga' phags zhes bya ba
