119a2(mdo sde): btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen ldan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu rab tu gnas pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes
119a3(mdo sde): la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sdom pa la rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs
119a4(mdo sde): can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba 'phags pa'i 'od zer zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges byang chub sems dpa'
119a5(mdo sde): rgyal tshab zla ba zhes bya ba btang ngo / / / bam po bdun pa// / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
119a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa kha lo sgyur ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mya ngan med pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba btang ngo //
119a7(mdo sde): de'i yang 'dab chagasan/ 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa lus mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la ches kyang ston te
119b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab drag ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba'i spos zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
119b2(mdo sde): pa skye med 'gyur bar mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yongs bsgrags nyon mongs yang dag bcom
119b3(mdo sde): zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan kun la rab tu gnas zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa snyan pa'i bshes gnyen zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing
119b4(mdo sde): gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i bshes gnyen zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ btang
119b5(mdo sde): ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/ / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams phun sum tshogs pa kun la rab tu gnas zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa snyan pa'i nga ro/
119b6(mdo sde): zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab chos 'phags zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na
119b7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan bral zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang
120a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rin chen me zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ btang ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro//
120a2(mdo sde): de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams snyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhos la chos kyang
120a3(mdo sde): ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' me tog rgyal po zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog kun tu bkram zhes bya ba yod de/
120a4(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa me tog rab tu gtor ba'i tog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab spos kyi dpal
120a5(mdo sde): zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par bsgrags pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas spos kyi 'od zer ces bya ba bzhugs te/
120a6(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab nges 'byung zhes bya ba btang ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams de'i yang 'dab chags na// 'jig rten gyi
120a7(mdo sde): khams phyogs ldan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spun btud ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab
120b1(mdo sde): / smon lam chen po zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od 'phro can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od btang zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la
120b2(mdo sde): chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sbyin sreg byas pa'i 'od ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od ces bya ba yod de/
120b3(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od lhun po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ri rab lta bu zhes bya ba btang
120b4(mdo sde): ngo de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen snang zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos
120b5(mdo sde): kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen byin zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu 'dug spos bdugs zhes bya ba
120b6(mdo sde): yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan gnyis gtsug tor can zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gnyis 'od
120b7(mdo sde): ces bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te zhes bya ba nas/ btang ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams srid pa
121a1(mdo sde): zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gsum gyi khyu mchog rnam par gnon ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des
121a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab srid pa gsum zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
121a3(mdo sde): 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mi 'jigs sbyin zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i
121a4(mdo sde): yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu dmigs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i rigs kyi khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston
121a5(mdo sde): te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal che ba lag pa can zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
121a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa zad mi shes pa'i khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des
121a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ btang ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i yang 'dab chags
121b1(mdo sde): na/ 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu yongs su spangs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnga smra zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub/
121b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' rgyal tsha spos rab gtong zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs
121b3(mdo sde): te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' yul la mi gnas pa zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
121b4(mdo sde): sgra rnam par bsgrags zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rnam par sgrags zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges
121b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mchog gi tshogs can zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dang chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sgron ma'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
121b6(mdo sde): pa shin tu rab tu gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab pa rA dzA na zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang
121b7(mdo sde): 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te
122a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros dpe med ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu dga' byed ces bya ba/
122a2(mdo sde): yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems
122a3(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab mtshan ma med pa'i mtshan nyid gocha zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ den de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan
122a4(mdo sde): mtha' yas rin chen ldan zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu yang dag brtags kyi spyod pa
122a5(mdo sde): zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgyu skar gyi 'phreng ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs ca
122a6(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sgrogs pa zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi 'am
122a7(mdo sde): gdugs kyi 'phreng ba bkod pazhes bya ba yod/ den de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'phags pa'i 'od kyi gzi brjid dpal zhes bya ba bzugs/ 'tsho zhing gnas la chos kyang ston no/
122b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab legs byin zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin/
122b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa pad+ma 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sangs rgyas chos 'byung
122b3(mdo sde): zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spos rab khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhis la/
122b4(mdo sde): chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye she dal ba 'gyur byed ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ku mu das rab tu
122b5(mdo sde): khebs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba tog gi 'od zer zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab
122b6(mdo sde): ri rab byin zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yangs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi glang po che zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing
122b7(mdo sde): gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mi 'khrug pa zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mchog ces bya ba
123a1(mdo sde): yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal
123a2(mdo sde): tsha ba bdud rtsi'i sgra zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos ldan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma brtsegs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes
123a3(mdo sde): la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab me tog ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog can zhes bya ba yod de/
123a4(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la ches kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab spyi bos byin zhes
123a5(mdo sde): bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tsam pa ka dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dang dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te// 'tsho zhing
123a6(mdo sde): gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mig bzangs zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen snying
123a7(mdo sde): po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen brtsegs zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu
123b1(mdo sde): mthong zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mdzangs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mdzangs mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos
123b2(mdo sde): kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu rab sangs rgyas zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde mchog ces bya ba yod de/
123b3(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa bde mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bde ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba btang
123b4(mdo sde): ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab gnas zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la
123b5(mdo sde): chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu rab gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od ces bya ba yod de/
123b6(mdo sde): den de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi tog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab kun tu 'od ces bya ba btang ngo //
123b7(mdo sde): de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba'i spos zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la
124a1(mdo sde): chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yon tan 'byung zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
124a2(mdo sde): blta na sdug ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad 'byung ba'i dpal gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/
124a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba yon tan ldan zhes bya ba btang ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
124a4(mdo sde): pa pad+ma 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sprin mos zhes bya ba btang ngo // 'jig rten gyi
124a5(mdo sde): khams de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi dra bas kun tu khebs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sgron ma 'tshang zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la
124a6(mdo sde): chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba spar 'chums ma yin zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen dra bas
124a7(mdo sde): kun du khebs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems/
124b1(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab grong khyer sgrogs zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags pa'i
124b2(mdo sde): rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mi khom thams cad 'gyur byed ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang
124b3(mdo sde): 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gdugs gcig pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu skar gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom
124b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rgyu skar gyi 'phreng ba zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams nam mkha'i rigs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
124b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa lhun po mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen lhun po zhes bya ba btang ngo //
124b6(mdo sde): de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i rna cha gdub kor rnam par dag pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te
124b7(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten
125a1(mdo sde): gyi khams mngon du bgrod pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i sgra zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das/
125a2(mdo sde): des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mya ngan med ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos rigs btsun zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i
125a3(mdo sde): 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mya ngan med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/
125a4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu rnam dag ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen lhun po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang
125a5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rigs btsun zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab snang zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen me tog sna tshogs
125a6(mdo sde): me tog kun tu rgyas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab blo gros mtha' yas zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang
125a7(mdo sde): 'da' chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mthu dpal zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mchog gi tshogs can zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston
125b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ba lang bdag ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen me tog ces bya ba yod de/
125b2(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa rdul med rdul bral rnam par grol ba'i go cha zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems
125b3(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab 'od byed ces bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gser du snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi me tog ces
125b4(mdo sde): bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rnam par snang byed ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/
125b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams gser du snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen khang pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing ga zhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub
125b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu rab gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams snying po can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs
125b7(mdo sde): 'byung zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dpas byin zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/
126a1(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams grol ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa grol ba'i 'od zer zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan
126a2(mdo sde): 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab byams pa zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me dog rab gtor ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
126a3(mdo sde): me tog 'byung zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab me tog gi gdugs me tog kun tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba btang ngo //
126a4(mdo sde): de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa me tog gdugs zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom
126a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab gser gdugs zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
126a6(mdo sde): pab don yod go cha zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab log pa'i go cha bgos zhes bya ba btang ngo //
126a7(mdo sde): de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par bsgrags pa'i stobs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing
126b1(mdo sde): ga zhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab skyed byed ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshangs
126b2(mdo sde): pa'i dpal zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/
126b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi nga re zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te zhes bya ba nas/ btang ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro//
126b4(mdo sde): de'i yang 'da' chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang sngon
126b5(mdo sde): te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mig rnam dag ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tog ces bya ba yod de de na
126b6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas tshogs can zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rig sa
126b7(mdo sde): zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gsor zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa kha khe sgyur ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnas mas kyang
127a1(mdo sde): stod na/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal chab sde nas bya ba bdang // de'i yang 'da' chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab gnas zhes bya
127a2(mdo sde): yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba 'das
127a3(mdo sde): pa rnam par gnon zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams srid pa med ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro kun rnam par 'joms mdzad ces bya ba
127a4(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu yang dag brtags kyi go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags
127a5(mdo sde): nan/ 'jig rten gyi khams yid gnyis can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yid gnyis yang dag 'joms par mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/
127a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mthong ma thag tu nges pa'i go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ye shes mchog ces bya ba yod de//
127a7(mdo sde): den de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan ma med pa'i nga ro zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rnam par bltas pa'i nga
127b1(mdo sde): ro zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rab gnas zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas ldan zhes bya ba bzhugs te
127b2(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab gom pa mtha' yas rnam par gnon ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig
127b3(mdo sde): rten gyi khams rin chen rang gnas zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das/
127b4(mdo sde): des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rdo rje rnam par gnon zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sgrogs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
127b5(mdo sde): pa pad+ma mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen me tog
127b6(mdo sde): ces bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma 'byung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la
127b7(mdo sde): chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mchog ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dang chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams legs 'byung zhes bya ba yod de
128a1(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i go cha thogs pa med ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan
128a2(mdo sde): 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rdul bral sde zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
128a3(mdo sde): pa 'od mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu gnon ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang
128a4(mdo sde): 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam dag ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen lhun po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan
128a5(mdo sde): 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab lhun po chen po zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba sgron ma zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
128a6(mdo sde): pa nyi ma sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab nyi ma sgron ma mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya
128a7(mdo sde): ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshon rtsi phung po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes
128b1(mdo sde): la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dri med 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams skar mngar
128b2(mdo sde): zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa skar mda' sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal
128b3(mdo sde): tshab 'phel ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ye shes 'byung gnas zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa gong na med pa'i 'od zer
128b4(mdo sde): zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha yon tan 'byung gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab
128b5(mdo sde): chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma'i gdugs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos ston te/ bcom ldan
128b6(mdo sde): 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshabarda sgra zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gdugs gcig pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de
128b7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa spyan mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab tshangs pa'i nga
129a1(mdo sde): zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs te/
129a2(mdo sde): 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal cheb phyogs snang zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sa la zhes
129a3(mdo sde): bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sa la'i dbang po rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal
129a4(mdo sde): tsha ba bru bo zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab gnas zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la
129a5(mdo sde): chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bag tsha ba med pa zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshogs zhes bya ba yod
129a6(mdo sde): dede na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen lhun po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems
129a7(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab grags pa zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba
129b1(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sprin ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi kham/
129b2(mdo sde): kun tu 'dzin zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sman pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal
129b3(mdo sde): tshab rtsi'i rgyal po zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpal bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dpal bzang po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/
129b4(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu bzang po zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
129b5(mdo sde): shin tu rab gnas zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yos pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa'
129b6(mdo sde): rgyal tshab phug sbas zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gsheg pa spos mchog dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te
129b7(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gnas la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab spos dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na// 'jig rten gyi khabs spos dpa
130a1(mdo sde): zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na spos mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan
130a2(mdo sde): 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab pad+ma'i snying po zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tsan dan gyi bsung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na
130a3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan khang pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dpal sbas zhes bya ba
130a4(mdo sde): btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen dra bas khe bas zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te//
130a5(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab blo gros mtha' yas zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi
130a6(mdo sde): khams me tog can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma 'jigs byed me tog mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston
130a7(mdo sde): te/ bcom ldan 'das nges/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dbyangs mtha' yas nga ro zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang byed ces bya
130b1(mdo sde): ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dra ba can zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab pas byin
130b2(mdo sde): zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba sgron ma zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu rab gnas rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/
130b3(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab brjed med nga ro zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
130b4(mdo sde): tsan dan gyi bsung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na spos mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub
130b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' rgyal tshab 'byor pas byin zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yid bral zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba thams cad nye bar
130b6(mdo sde): sgrub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab phan 'dod ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/
130b7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams spos sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs pa thams cad ston ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te// bcom
131a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab smon lam mtha' yas zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs zhes bya ba
131a2(mdo sde): yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yongs bsgrags don yod ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab go/
131a3(mdo sde): cha mtha' yas zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu rab gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/
131a4(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba gtsug na nor bu zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde
131a5(mdo sde): ba can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas bkod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang
131a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab thogs pa med pa'i snying stobs go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma'i gdugs gcig pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
131a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa bde ba bkod pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen tog ces bya ba btang ngo/
131b1(mdo sde): de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i tog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te
131b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab nam mkha' rnam dag spyod pa zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bzangs byed ces bya ba yod de/ de na
131b3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po mchog dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bzang po dbyangs zhes bya ba
131b4(mdo sde): btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mar med byed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa khyu mchog mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang
131b5(mdo sde): ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab khyu mchog ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog dri zhim zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
131b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa spun rnam dag ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mig bzangs zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i
131b7(mdo sde): yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu rab gnas zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa kha lo sgyur ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das
132a1(mdo sde): des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rgya mtsho zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshad tshogs mtha' yas zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
132a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa lhun po mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab tshad med blo gros zhes
132a3(mdo sde): bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dga' 'byung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pas ma pham pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing
132a4(mdo sde): gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab phasam pham pa zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdul zhes bya ba yod de/
132a5(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa mngon rtogs zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mi 'jigs pa zhes bya ba btang ngo //
132a6(mdo sde): de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos 'das zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po mtha' yas mu med spos bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston
132a7(mdo sde): te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab spos mchog dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams grong khyer zhes bya ba yod de/
132b1(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam dag rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal
132b2(mdo sde): tshab sgron ma 'chang zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mchog ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho
132b3(mdo sde): zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu rab gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dga'
132b4(mdo sde): ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa
132b5(mdo sde): rgyal tshabartul bas byin zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po rnam dag ces bya ba bzhugs te
132b6(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen lhun po zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten rgya
132b7(mdo sde): khams mdzes pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems
133a1(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab mdzes pa chen po'i dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dri zhim zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
133a2(mdo sde): tshangs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab tshangs pa'i nga ro zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang
133a3(mdo sde): 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dbang po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med pa'i spyan zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston
133a4(mdo sde): te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dbang pos byin zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/
133a5(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dang 'argyal tshab yon
133a6(mdo sde): tan byin zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dpal zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid dpal zhes bya ba
133a7(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes bsags zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/
133b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa legs par bsam pa'i smon lam yongs su grub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/
133b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab smon lam mtha' yas zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams grong khyer brgyan pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba yod de/
133b3(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab lhun po
133b4(mdo sde): rnam dag ces bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ye shes 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes spos zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing ga zhes
133b5(mdo sde): la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams khang pa zhes
133b6(mdo sde): bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa khang pa sde zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes rnam
133b7(mdo sde): par sems zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ye shes spos zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes brtsegs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/
134a1(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes 'byung gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/
134a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs kyi lhun po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/
134a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab phyogs su rnam par grags pa zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rab gnas zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
134a4(mdo sde): gsheg pa bde bdag ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab chos kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i
134a5(mdo sde): yang 'dab chags na/ 'jigs rten gyi khams grags dga' zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rdul bral mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/
134a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mi mjed kyi bdag po zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya
134a7(mdo sde): pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal
134b1(mdo sde): tsha ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan mtha' yas 'byung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sems can gyi bsam pa yang dag par
134b2(mdo sde): ston pa'i khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab chos kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang
134b3(mdo sde): 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan
134b4(mdo sde): 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dpa' ba zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams so sor bag yangs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gsheg
134b5(mdo sde): pa thams cad rtser 'jug rtsom pa'i khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshad rtag tu brtsams pa'i
134b6(mdo sde): go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu so sor yang dag gnas zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med pa'i 'od zer pad+mas
134b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sa'i nga ro rgyal po zhes bya
135a1(mdo sde): ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams chu klung gang+gA'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan kun dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de
135a2(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa bdud thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi sku yang dag par ston pa'i khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub
135a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bltas pa'i byang chub tu nges pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snying stobs kyi go cha bgos zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/ /
135a4(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' des snang ba chen po de mthong ste/ gsung bsal ba'i sgra de yang thos so// thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od de dang /
135a5(mdo sde): gsung bsal ba'i sgra de su'i lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu nub phyogs kyi phyogs char 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten
135a6(mdo sde): gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam
135a7(mdo sde): grangs kyi chos kyang ston te/ mthu de lta bu de ni de'i yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das de la/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bltas pa'i byang chub tu nges pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snying stobs
135b1(mdo sde): kyi go cha bgos kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba
135b2(mdo sde): dang / chos mnyan pa'i slad du/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bdag mchi bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i dus la dbab par shes na song zhig/ de nas
135b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bltas pa'i byang chub tu nges pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snying stobs kyi go cha bgos kyis/ pad+ma brgyad blangs nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ga la ba dang / bcom
135b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su gtor to/ / de nas pad+ma de dag 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'das te/ 'jig rten gyi bar dag las 'das nas/ rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshil bya ka lan
135b5(mdo sde): ta ka gnas pa ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der so sor yang dag par 'khod do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i 'khor bzhi po'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyis
135b6(mdo sde): de dag mthong nas kyang ngo mtshar du 'dzin par gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la pad+ma de dag gis lan gsum bskor ba byas nas spyan sngar 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas
135b7(mdo sde): pas pad+ma de dag la reg par mdzad nas/ reg pa tsam gyis pad+ma de dag las kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus dag mngon par byung ngo // byung nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa
136a1(mdo sde): 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas mi snang bar gyur to/ / / bam po brgyad pa// / mtha' yas mkhyen mnga' gang zag khyu mchog gtso// rang byung mtha' yas
136a2(mdo sde): chos rnams thugs su chud/ / khyod kyi rdzu 'phrul mtha' yas rgya chen gda'// 'jig rten khams rnams kun tu snang bar mdzad// de dag sangs rgyas kyi ni mtshan thos nas// zhu ba'i khyad par
136a3(mdo sde): kun tu zhu ba dang / / sangs rgyas blta dang phyag kyang bgyi slad du// mkhas pa de dag rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis mchis// byang chub go bgos dpa' bo gang mchis dag/ mi mjed 'jig rten
136a4(mdo sde): khams su rab gnas pa/ / de dag skye ba gcig gis thogs pa ste// de dag ming dang gzugs dang grags pas 'phags// de dag go cha'i dngos pos mi 'jigs shing // sems can sman
136a5(mdo sde): pa'i slad du yang dag zhugs/ / byang chub mchog la ji ltar reg 'gyur ba// 'jig rten rnam 'dren mchog la de dag zhu// ci skad mngon du chos tshol bgyid ce na// bdud rnams gzhom dang
136a6(mdo sde): byang chub thob slangad du/ / de nas nu ba zhu ba'i sprul pa rnams// gang yin de la shAkya thub pas gsungs// 'dren pas yang dag tshig gis de bstan nas// mi mchog de yi tshig rnams thos gyur te/
136a7(mdo sde): dga' zhing mgu la rjes su yi rang nas// bai de gshegs phyag 'tshal de dag 'khod par gyur// sprul pa de dag der ni mi snang nas// gang dag de bzhin gshegs la zhu ba kru// de dag
136b1(mdo sde): / gang nas mchis shing ming ci zhes// de tshe 'khor kyang spu rnams zing zhes byed// 'khor rnams bzhi po de dag gus pa yis// rgyal ba la ni zhu bar mi spro ste// de tshe 'jig rten mgon
136b2(mdo sde): po'i sprul pa sprul/ / de tshe dge slong kun dga' bzang po byung // mgon po zhu ba 'di zhu de dag gang // zhus nas kyang ni mi gda' ma mthong gyur// de dag su lags de dag su yi
136b3(mdo sde): lags/ / mgon po bshad cing the tsom bsal du gsol// smon lam dpa' bo ldan pa'i go cha ltos// de yis byin gyis brlabs nas 'dir lhags te// shar phyogs kyi ni 'jig
136b4(mdo sde): rten khams kyi tshul/ / grangs med dag nas de dag lhags pa yin// dpa' bo 'jig rten phan phyir gang lhags pa// rnam par bltas nas dong bar gyur pa ste// bsam pa dag pa byang chub
136b5(mdo sde): phyir spyod pa/ / de yi smon lam de ni de 'dra'o// de dag dge bas nges par sangs rgyas mthong // de dag 'dir ni de la sgyid mi lug/ tshul khrims kyis kyang dman par mi 'gyur te//
136b6(mdo sde): thos po mang zhing pha rol phyin pas 'phags// de dag thabs shes pa la shin tu bslabs// mngal gyi gnas su 'gro bar mi 'gyur te// 'khor ba'i tshe na tshe rabs tshe rabs su//
136b7(mdo sde): de dag chos kyi sems rgyud brjed mi 'gyur// rtag tu sangs rgyas rnams dang mngon du phrad // rtag tu 'phags pa rnams dang 'grogs par 'gyur// dpa' bo de yis sems can 'dir mdzod
137a1(mdo sde): rnams/ rtag tu de la rab tu 'byung ba thob// mthong ma thag tu dge bas de 'dra ste// gang dag gzhan ma brjod pa de dag mang // dpa' bo de yi yon tan gang
137a2(mdo sde): yod pa/ / mang du bsgrags kyang mthar thug 'gyur ba med// dpa' bo shin tu gnas pa de yi ming // de tshe bud med gang gis thos gyur pa// de ni phyin chad bud med mangs mi 'gyur//
137a3(mdo sde): sems can dam pa'i mchog tu de 'gyur ro// skyes pa bud med gang gis ming thos shing // thos nas de la'ang dga' ba skyed byed la// sangs rgyas zhing der smon lam 'debs byed pa// lus
137a4(mdo sde): zhig nas ni der yang skye bar 'gyur/ / zhing yang dag par skye bar 'gyur ba yin// skyes pa bud med 'on te gzhan yang rung // gang gis ming thos nam zhig dang byed pa// thams cad
137a5(mdo sde): byang chub ched las nyams mi 'gyur/ / gang dag gcer bu'i sems can ma gtogs par// thos nas su zhig dga' ba skye mi 'gyur// sangs rgyas kyis kyang de ni yod ma gsungs//
137a6(mdo sde): 'on kyang de dag dge dang ldan par 'gyur// gang dag bsam pas ming yang thos pa ni// ji ltar rtsi yis skyon rnams sel byed bzhin// sems can de dag gis ni der mthong ba//
137a7(mdo sde): byang chub don du nges 'gyur the tsom med// gang zhig pa la sha yi 'dab thogs shing // de dang der ni rtsi dag byed gyur na// de tshe kun nas sman gyi stobs kyis su// sus kyang der ni mi
137b1(mdo sde): la tshig mi 'gyur/ / gang tshe sbrul gdug gzi brjid drag po yis// dug gang de dag mi gdug byed 'gyur te// sa yi steng na kun tu ston byed na// de 'dra'i sman brkos pas ni ci zhig
137b2(mdo sde): bya/ sbrul gdug dri ni gang dag snom byed pa// sbrul de thams cad 'chi ba'i dus byed 'gyur// de ltar rtsi smran 'dra ba'i mi de ni// ming gis sangs rgyas mdzad pa byed par 'gyur//
137b3(mdo sde): de tshe phyogs bcu dag tu bsgrags pa na// dpa' bo de yi ming ni sus thos pa// de yis ming gis las ni 'di byed de// bud med gang zag la ni reg mi 'gyur// gang gis mthong dang bsti/
137b4(mdo sde): stang byed ci smos// de na rgyal bas dge slong gang sprul pa// kun dga' bzang po zhes ni bya ba des// rgyal bas de skad bsgrags pa de 'dra ba// byang chub zhugs pa su mchis de la zhus//
137b5(mdo sde): kun dga' bzang po go cha dpa' bo'i ming // 'jig rten khams 'dir yod ces ngas thos na// zhum pa med pa'i yid kyis brjod par bya// de ltar bde bar gshegs pas zab bstan
137b6(mdo sde): pa/ / rgyal ba'i byang chub yid ches dka' ba yi// sems can dge ba chung dang ldan pa lhags// da ltar nga yi tshe ni cung zad gnas// kun dga' 'di na sems can mchog yod de/
137b7(mdo sde): de ring kho nar 'khor du lhags par 'gyur// 'jig rten mgon po gang dag 'dir lhags pa'i// / go cha bsngags pa phyogs bcur bzlog mi nus// kun dga' bzang skyong rin chen 'byung
138a1(mdo sde): gnas dang / / dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang ni ded dpon bzang // yon tan sbas pa mkhas dang de bzhin du// dpa' bo bzang stobs gang yin de la ltos//
138a2(mdo sde): chu zhes bya ba dang ni chu lha dang // bzang skyong de bzhin dge slong ci 'dra rnams// ji ltar skyob gyur dge slong de dag ltos// de dag rnams kyis go cha de bsam yas// don yod ces
138a3(mdo sde): ni yongs su bsgrags gyur pa/ / de dag gis ni don yod go cha bgos// de dag mthong ba'ang don yod 'gyur ba yin// de dag bsnyen bkur byed pa smos ci dgos// kun dga' gang
138a4(mdo sde): su dag gis de dag mthong / / gang dag su yis ming yang thos gyur pa// de dag nam yang byang chub dogs pa med// de dag nam du'ang log par ltung mi 'gyur// de dag thams cad
138a5(mdo sde): brtson pas tshogs pa yin/ / de dag thams cad shes pas tshogs par gyur// rtag tu tshul khrims phung pos de rtag gnas// thams cad theg pa mchog la de ltar 'dun// kun dag
138a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas zhing 'dir phyogs bcu yi/ / 'jig rten da ltar gang dag su gnas pa// dpa' bo de ci go cha 'dod gyur pa// de la rgyal ba kun gyis bsngags pa brjod// gang gis
138a7(mdo sde): bsngags brjod rgyal ba de dag kyang / / byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe der shes te// shAkya khyu mchog 'jig rten mgon po dang // byang chub zhugs pa'i dpa' bo de dag blta'o// de thos
138b1(mdo sde): nas kyang gsol ba bta' gyur pa/ / mgon po mi mjed 'jig rten khams su mchi// rgyal ba rnams kyi sku la bskor byas nas// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad lhags// dge slong
138b2(mdo sde): dag gi yang ming thos nas/ / de tshe byang chub mchog tu 'dun pa skyed// gang dag ming dang 'dun pas byang chub zhugs// de dag rgyal bas byang chub der lung bstan// bskal pa grangs med dag
138b3(mdo sde): tu las byas shing / / mi dge bsgrubs pa gang dag su yod pa// de phyir snyigs ma'i dus na de dag ni// nga dang lhan cig sangs rgyas zhing du lhags// nga yi byang chub mchog 'di thob gyur kyang //
138b4(mdo sde): de tshe sems can blta bar spro ba med// gang dag phyi dus dge slong rnams 'byung ba// rtsub dang gtum dang shin du rtsub pa yin// de tshe kun tu 'jigs pa thob nas su// yang dang yang du brtson
138b5(mdo sde): 'grus stobs skyed cing / / mu ge'i dus su rdzan rdzin sbyin pa byin// de dag rnams kyi sbyin pa rtsub pa yin// de dag 'di la gus pa che byas nas// phyi dus 'jigs pa chen po de yi tshe// srog
138b6(mdo sde): kyang btang nas don ni bya snyam ste/ / nga yi chos chog spel zhing 'dzin par byed// dus de na ni mi dge'i las rnams kyi// smon lam gnas kyang 'jig rten dag na yod// 'di na las de dag ni byas pa
138b7(mdo sde): na/ / de yi tshe na brnyas pa'i tshul du 'gyur// de dag der ni 'dra'i chos thos nas// de tshe der ni chos min 'du shes 'gyur// chos 'di rgyal bas gsungs pa ma yin zhes// 'jig rten
139a1(mdo sde): phyin ci log la kun dga' ltos/ / de tshe dge slong slob pas 'du byed la// rtag pa cung zad med ces skyo thob pas// de tshe mgo la me 'bar bzhin du rtogs// 'chi med thob par bya phyir ma lus brtsal
139a2(mdo sde): bstan 'di rab tu rnam par 'jig thob nas/ / der ni lha yang sdug bsngal dag tu gyur// de tshe 'jigs pa mthong na mi rung zhes// da lta'i dus su shi yang sla snyam sems// bag tsha med pa'i sgrogs pa sgrogs pa yi//
139a3(mdo sde): drang srong che de de ring bdag cag mthong // 'dren pa mchog gi zhal du lta byed cing // kye ma rgyal bas bshad ces yi rangs so// dge slong bsam gtan byed pa dag kyang mthong // dbang thob rdzu
139a4(mdo sde): 'phrul stobs kyis mkhas gyur pa/ / 'di ni ting 'dzin shes rab pha rol phyin// de dag phyi ma'i dus su ji ltar mthong // sdig pa'i dge slong stobs dang ldan 'gyur zhing // de tshe tshul ldan shin tu
139a5(mdo sde): tshar gcad 'gyur/ / gnas khang gnas pa tshegs kyis 'thob 'gyur zhing // de tshe lha yid shin tu mi dga' 'gyur// kye ma kye ma bstan pa rab tu 'jig/ gang gi don du de tshe dka' spyod pa// de dag dge slong sdig pas char gcad 'gyur
139a6(mdo sde): bstan pa 'jig par 'gyur ba 'di la ltos/ / 'dir ni phan tshun kun tu dga' bar 'gyur// des pa rnams la de dag bsngags min brjod// sangs rgyas la ni 'khrug long byed pa dag/ de dag khyim na gnas
139a7(mdo sde): pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ / dge bsnyen ma dang 'dre bar byed 'gyur zhing // de na de dag lag pa gcig tu byed// rgyal ba'i bstan la mgus gyur nas su// byang chub mchog kyang spong bar byed par gyur
139b1(mdo sde): dkon mchog gsum la mchog tu 'tshe 'gyur te/ / de dag rtag tu nges pa rnams kyis spangs// khyu mchog rwa chag ma gyur ma rungs pa// de bzhin tshul khrims ldan pa rnam par spong // de tshe tshul khrim
139b2(mdo sde): ldan pa dpyas 'gyur zhing / / de tshe dge slong sdig pas brnyas tshul 'gyur// 'jigs chen phyin ci log gi dus su ni// skyo ba thob byos bag kyang yod par gyis// bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan la
139b3(mdo sde): brtson 'grus skyed/ / de tshe 'jigs pa chen po 'byung bar 'gyur// sdig pa'i dge slong rnams dang 'phrad ma byed// de yi tshe na sdug bsngal gnas par 'gyur// de na byang chub sem dpa' kun
139b4(mdo sde): tu blta ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snying stobs kyi go cha bgos/ / 'di lta ste// dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa zhig gis lag pa bskums pa rkyong bar byed pa 'am// brkyang bskums
139b5(mdo sde): par byed pa'i skad cig des/ / de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom
139b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam
139b7(mdo sde): stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdud thams cad la sku kun tu ston pa'i khyu mchog snyun gsol lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu
140a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de spyan mi mnga' 'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ 'gyur ba mi mnga' 'am/ des gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so// // 'jig rten gyi khams
140a2(mdo sde): de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtshan ldan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan med nga ro zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das
140a3(mdo sde): des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab tshangs dbyangs nga ro zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'dzin med ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan ma med pa'i
140a4(mdo sde): nga ro zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mtshan nyid gcig pas mchod ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab
140a5(mdo sde): chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtshan nyid med pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan
140a6(mdo sde): 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba pad+ma rab tu gtor ba'i char pa zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
140a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa rin chen 'brang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sna tshogs brtsegs zhes bya ba btang
140b1(mdo sde): / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'jam pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rdul med blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom lda
140b2(mdo sde): 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mu khyud 'dzin ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes me tog
140b3(mdo sde): 'byung zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sa 'dzin rab gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/
140b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams nam mkha' rnam par dag ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te
140b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen gdugs zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtshan ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
140b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa rab tu zhi ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ut+pa la zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/
140b7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rdul med khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des
141a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sems dpa' med ces bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
141a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa 'gro ba thams cad so sor bag yangs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab zab mo 'gyur byed
141a3(mdo sde): ces bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan 'byung gnas zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dpal zhes pa bzhug
141a4(mdo sde): te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ bya chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab 'gro ba 'dzin ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ldan
141a5(mdo sde): zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal
141a6(mdo sde): tshab rnam par rgyal ba'i sde zhes bya ba tang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gnod med ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs par gshegs pa zhes bya ba 'azhug
141a7(mdo sde): tete/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ut+pa la dmar pos
141b1(mdo sde): khebs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyis rgyags mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal
141b2(mdo sde): tshab spos mchog lhun po zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams kha lo sgyur ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas gzigs zhes bya ba bzhugs te/
141b3(mdo sde): 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des// byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshabartul ba mtha' yas zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshogs chen zhes
141b4(mdo sde): bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rnam par gnon ces bya/
141b5(mdo sde): ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'jigs shing 'jigs su rung bas mi 'jigs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs pa brnyes pa zhes bya ba bzhugs
141b6(mdo sde): te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab phyogs su rab grags zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba zhes
141b7(mdo sde): bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba sgron me zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal chab sngon du 'gro ba zhes
142a1(mdo sde): bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab snang zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa me sgron zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chog
142a2(mdo sde): kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mi 'dzin zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od byed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
142a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa rab tu 'bar zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rnam par bsgrags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba btang ngo //
142a4(mdo sde): de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'dren zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu gyen du gshegs zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan
142a5(mdo sde): 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shes rab mchog ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mchog gi nor du zhes
142a6(mdo sde): bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rab kyi blo gros zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
142a7(mdo sde): rdo rje 'byung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rjes rnam par gnon ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab
142b1(mdo sde): yon tan 'byung gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams nga ro can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs
142b2(mdo sde): te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sred med kyi bu zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dga' 'byung
142b3(mdo sde): zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi stobs kyis rnam par bsgrags zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems
142b4(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab smon lam rnam par bsgrags zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde 'byung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bde mchog ces bya ba bzhugs
142b5(mdo sde): te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dkar zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chag na/ 'jig rten gyi khams skya rengs zhes bya ba yod de/
142b6(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal po'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ded dpon zhes bya ba btang
142b7(mdo sde): ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tog bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dpal bzang po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos la kyang ston te/
143a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rnam par rgyal ba'i sde zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshangs pa'i dpal zhes bya
143a2(mdo sde): ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs nga ro zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen
143a3(mdo sde): dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen me tog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston/

143a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa pad+ma 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab pad+ma dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba btang ngo //
